•生物或者危害 生物或者危害必须全部或者基本上由金属组成才会受到影响（这包括多数机械陷阱）。它承受 [[/r 8d6]] 伤害（基础强韧豁免），以及在豁免失败时 [[/r 2d6 #persistent]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续伤害}。让该法术影响一个危害并接触它可能会触发该危害，由GM判定。

•物品 该锈蚀造成 [[/r 2d6]] 伤害，会受到穿戴或者持握该物品的生物的反射豁免；如果该物品未被持有，它自动获得大失败。在豁免失败时，该物品也会承受 [[/r 1d6 #persistent]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续伤害}。对于被持有的物品，该持续伤害在持有生物的回合结束发生；如果该物体在你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放该法术 Cast the Spell}时未被持有，该伤害在你的回合结束发生。当以某人穿戴的护甲为目标时，其负载比列出值高1，这是因为携带盔甲比穿戴盔甲更为笨重。薄的铁或钢制物品，例如武器，具有20HP和10的破损阈值，厚实的铁或钢制物品，例如多数盔甲，具有36HP以及18的破损阈值。其他材料数据可以在核心规则书找到。

升阶 (+1) 对生物或者危害的初始伤害增加 [[/r 2d6]]，你可以指定为目标的物品的最大负载增加1。

Safe Passage.name: 安全通道 Safe Passage
Safe Passage.description:
你驱散身周所有的危险，在选择的区域中创造能维持一小段时间的安全通路。任何通过该区域的人，在对抗地形和环境的危害效果时，包括环境伤害，危险地形，和区域中的危害，获得下列好处。对抗这类效果时，该法术赋予对AC和豁免的+2状态加值，以及对来自这类效果的所有伤害抗力5。除此之外，该法术防止任何在区域中可能坍塌的事物发生坍塌，例如摇晃的桥或者不稳的天花板。除非应力巨大，即使正常的此类建筑也会坍塌。

安全通道 只会抵抗有害效果，而不是抵消不方便之处，它也不会减弱困难地形，移除降水导致的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 等效果。它也不会保护你免受区域中生物的危害。

升阶 (5环级) 赋予的抗力提升到10，该区域可以长120尺。

升阶 (8环级) 赋予的抗力提升到15，该区域可以长500尺。

Safeguard Secret.name: 保卫机密 Safeguard Secret
Safeguard Secret.description:
你保障一段秘密的安全，不会被间谍所窥探。

选择一段至少部分目标知晓的信息；你仅能指定在你施放法术的整个1分钟内都在法术射程中的生物为目标。

在隐匿该知识的技能检定（通常是欺骗（Deception）检定上、在对抗专门尝试了解该知识的法术和强迫它们揭露该知识的效果的豁免骰上，该法术赋予你选择的知晓该条知识的生物+4状态加值。

如果你再次施放该法术，任何之前你施放的 保卫机密 Safeguard Secret 会结束。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.3HEiYVhqypfc4IsP]{法术效果：保卫机密}

Sanctified Ground.name: 祝佑阵地 Sanctified Ground
Sanctified Ground.description: 你将圣水泼洒其中，祝福该区域，保护该区域免受敌人侵袭。选择异怪（aberration），天族（celestial），龙（dragon），魔族（fiends），监视者（monitor），或者不死生物（undead）。该区域中的生物在对抗所选择类型的生物的AC、攻击骰、豁免骰上获得+1状态加值。

Sanctuary.name: 圣域术 Sanctuary
Sanctuary.description:
你引动防护能量，保护一个生物免受敌人攻击。尝试攻击该目标的生物必须每次尝试一次意志豁免骰。如果目标使用敌对动作，该法术结束。

大成功 圣域术结束。

成功 生物可以尝试其攻击，以及该轮中的其他对该目标的任何其他攻击。

失败 目标无法攻击，并且该动作被浪费。它在该轮中无法继续对目标尝试攻击。

大失败 该目标浪费该动作，并且在圣域术剩余持续时间中均无法尝试攻击目标。

Sanguine Mist.name: Sanguine Mist
Sanguine Mist.description:
You unleash a cloud of foul, blood-sucking fog that drains the vitality from the living to bolster your own. Each living creature in the area when you Cast the Spell, aside from you, takes 6d6 negative damage with a basic Fortitude save. Creatures in the area are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, and all creatures outside the cloud become concealed to creatures within it.

The first time each round you Sustain this Spell on subsequent turns, living creatures in the area take an additional [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6 negative damage} with another basic Fortitude save. You also gain temporary Hit Points equal to half the damage a single creature took when you Sustained the spell this turn; calculate these temporary Hit Points using the creature that took the most damage. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Heightened (+1) The initial damage increases by 2d6 and the secondary damage increases by [[/r 1d6]].

Savant's Curse.name: Savant's Curse
Savant's Curse.description:
You afflict the target with a curse that fills its mind with distracting and hyperspecialized minutiae, causing it to second-guess even simple facts. The target must attempt a Will saving throw.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success For 10 minutes, the target must roll twice and use the worse result whenever attempting an Arcana, Lore, Occultism, or Society check. If the target succeeds at a check to Recall Knowledge, it gains one piece of true knowledge and one piece of erroneous knowledge, but it has no way of knowing which is which (this has no effect if the target critically succeeds at a check to Recall Knowledge).

Failure As success, but the effect is permanent.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target treats the outcomes of all checks to Recall Knowledge as one degree of success worse than the result the target rolled (a critical success becomes a success, a success becomes a failure, and a failure becomes a critical failure).

Savor the Sting.name: 品尝剧痛 Savor the Sting
Savor the Sting.description:
你向目标施加痛苦，并以其苦痛为乐。这会造成1d4心灵伤害和 [[/r {1d4}[persistent,mental]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续心灵伤害}；目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。只要目标在从该法术承受 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续伤害} ，你在对抗目标的攻击骰和技能检定上获得+1状态加值。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标承受一半伤害，并且不承受持续伤害。

失败 目标承受完整初始伤害和持续伤害。

大失败 目标承受双倍初始伤害和持续伤害。

升阶 (+1) 该初始伤害增加1d4，并且该持续伤害增加1d4。

Scatter Scree.name: Scatter Scree
Scatter Scree.description:
You evoke a jumble of rocks in the area. The scattering rocks deal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier to creatures in the area, with a basic Reflex save. The ground in the area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. A creature can Interact to clear a square of this scree. If you cast this spell again, any previous scatter scree you have cast ends.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Schadenfreude.name: Schadenfreude
Schadenfreude.description:
Trigger You critically fail a saving throw against a foe's effect.

You distract your enemy with their feeling of smug pleasure when you fail catastrophically. They must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is distracted by its amusement and takes a -1 status penalty on Perception checks and Will saves for 1 round. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.TjGHxli0edXI6rAg]{Spell Effect: Schadenfreude (Success)}

Failure The creature is overcome by its amusement and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is lost in its amusement and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Scholarly Recollection.name: 博学强记 Scholarly Recollection
Scholarly Recollection.description:
触发 你尝试一次觉察检定以搜索（Seek），或者你使用你受训的技能尝试一次技能检定以回想知识（Recall Knowledge）。

在集中思维时，你念出一段简短的祈祷，你的神祇赐予了你当前正好需要的信息。为触发检定骰两次，并使用较好的结果。

Scintillating Pattern.name: 闪光图纹 Scintillating Pattern
Scintillating Pattern.description:
涌动变换的色彩团在空中形成。在图纹中，以及在图纹区域20尺范围内的生物 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}。在你施放时处于图纹中的生物，进入图纹中的生物，在图纹中结束回合的生物，或者对图纹使用搜索（Seek）或者交互（Interact）动作的生物在此时必须尝试一次意志豁免。已经被图纹影响的生物无需尝试新的豁免。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 该生物。 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑Confused} [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

大失败 该生物被 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned} [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。在震慑状态结束后，该生物会困惑，直到法术持续时间结束。

Scintillating Safeguard.name: 闪耀护卫 Scintillating Safeguard
Scintillating Safeguard.description:
触发 一个效果会对射程内的生物造成物理或者能量伤害。

闪光的魔法屏障包复了每个目标，从触发效果中保护它们。选择触发效果所造成的物理或者能量伤害中的一种类型。对于触发效果，每个目标获得对该伤害类型的抗力10。该抗力仅对最初的伤害生效，对持续伤害和其他后续效果没有作用。

升阶 (+1) 该抗力增加1。

Scorching Ray.name: Scorching Ray
Scorching Ray.description:
You fire a ray of heat and flame. Make a spell attack roll against a single creature. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 fire damage, and on a critical hit, the target takes double damage.

For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, you can fire an additional ray at a different target, to a maximum of three rays targeting three different targets for 3 actions. These attacks each increase your multiple attack penalty, but you don't increase your multiple attack penalty until after you make all the spell attack rolls for scorching ray. If you spend 2 or more actions Casting the Spell, the damage increases to [[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6 fire damage} on a hit, and it still deals double damage on a critical hit.

Heightened (+1) The damage to each target increases by 1d6 for the 1-action version, or by [[/r {2d6}[fire]]] for the 2-action and 3-action versions.

Scouring Sand.name: Scouring Sand
Scouring Sand.description:
You blast the area with grit that scours away soil and gets into creatures' eyes. For the duration of the spell, any plant-based difficult terrain smaller than a tree becomes loose, allowing each 5-foot square of it to be cleared with a single Interact action. In addition, scouring sand attempts to counteract @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Entangle} and other effects that create or manipulate plant-based terrain in its area. Successfully counteracting an effect removes only the portion of its area that overlaps with scouring sand's area. After one such attempt, the effect is temporarily immune to scouring sand's counteract for 24 hours. Each creature in the area when you Cast this Spell or that ends its turn in the area must attempt a Reflex save.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 minute or until it uses an Interact action to get the sand out of its eyes.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for its next action.

Heightened (3rd) Once per round when you Sustain the Spell, you can move the center of the burst to a spot within range.

Heightened (6th) As the 3rd-level version, except the range is 120 feet and the area is a 20-foot burst.

Scrying.name: 探知 Scrying
Scrying.description:
你使用魔法探测所选择的生物。探知类似 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zvKWclOZ7A53DObE]{鹰眼术 Clairvoyance}，但其影像没有那么精确，无法用以传送术（teleport）以及其他类似法术。你在目标上方直接创造一个眼睛，而不是在500尺内的地点创造一个眼睛。当你选择一个目标时，你要么了解其名字，要么接触其一个所有物或者其身体一部分。如果你没有遇见过目标，探知的DC减少2，并且如果你不知道目标的特征（例如你在犯罪现场发现了一颗未知生物的牙），该DC改为减少10。探知的效果基于目标的意志豁免骰。

大成功 法术失败，并且目标暂时免疫1星期。目标也会瞥见你，并且了解到你的大致距离和方向。

成功 该法术结束，并且目标暂时免疫1天。

失败 该法术成功。

大失败 该法术成功，并且眼睛会随着目标移动，每轮移动至多60尺。/p>

Sculpt Sound.name: 塑声术 Sculpt Sound
Sculpt Sound.description:
你改变由一个生物或者物体发出的声音。在你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放该法术 Cast the Spell}时，选择你将如何改变该声音；你之后无法再作调整。你可以令不发出声音的物体发出声音，改变生物的口音，增强或者消除声音，或者将某种声音变成另一种。在对抗你的法术DC的觉察检定中成功的生物，可以了解该声音是被幻觉改变过的，这可能是在你消除声音后听见微弱的声音，但除非它们在觉察检定中大成功，否则它们无法知晓何为真的声音。你可以 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{解消 Dismiss} 该法术。

由于该法术仅是模糊声音，而不是防止声音，使用该法术令一个生物安静并不能防止该生物使用语言法术成分，但这确实会防止多数需要其他生物准确听见他的听觉效果。不自愿的生物可以尝试一次意志豁免。

成功 该生物受影响的声音不受影响。

失败 该生物受影响的声音按照你决定的方式被改变。

大失败 该生物被影响的声音被改变，并且目标由于这改变声音的带来的迷惑而获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}，持续1分钟。

升阶 (5环级) 你能够以至多6个生物或者6个物体为目标，以相同的方式改变所有受影响的物体或者生物的声音。

Sea Surge.name: Sea Surge
Sea Surge.description:
You slap or stomp on a nearby solid or liquid surface, sending a surge of water rushing away from you. The water forms a flat, 5-foot-thick, 10-foot-high wall of water between 5 and 15 feet wide (you decide). It moves 60 feet in a direction of your choice along the struck surface, extinguishing all non-magical fires, carrying along unattended objects of 1 Bulk or less, and pushing larger objects. The wave moves another 60 feet in the same direction at the start of your next turn, then vanishes. Large or smaller creatures in the area or that enter the area the wave moves through must attempt a Fortitude save.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. If the creature was Swimming, it gets a critical failure instead.

Critical Failure The creature is pushed 20 feet in the wave's direction, is knocked Prone, and takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage.

Seal Fate.name: 注定终局 Seal Fate
Seal Fate.description:
你念出一段诅咒，令一个生物会以注定的形式死去——冻伤，刺伤或者其他你设计的情形。从下列选择一个伤害类型：强酸，钝击，寒冷，电击，负能量，穿刺，挥砍，或者音波。法术效果基于目标的强韧豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标对选择的伤害类型获得弱点2，直到你的下个回合结束。

失败 如同成功，但持续时间为1分钟。如果该生物被选择类型的伤害减少到0HP，且等级为7或者更低，它会死亡。

大失败 如失败，但该持续时间为无限。

升阶 (+2) 该弱点增加1，会被自动杀死的生物最大等级增加4。

Searing Light.name: 灼热光辉 Searing Light
Searing Light.description:
你射出一道带有神圣能量的闪耀射线。尝试一次远程法术攻击。该射线造成5d6火焰伤害。如果目标是魔族（fiend）或者不死生物，你额外造成5d6善良伤害。

如果该光线通过一个魔法黑暗区域，或者以一个受到魔法黑暗影响的生物为目标，灼热光辉会尝试反制该黑暗。如果你需要判断光线是否通过一个黑暗区域，从你自身到法术目标划一条直线。

大成功 该目标承受双倍火焰伤害，并且如果是魔族（fiend）或者不死生物的善良伤害也翻倍。

成功 目标承受完整伤害。

升阶 (+1) 该火焰伤害增加2d6，对魔族（fiend）和不死生物的善良伤害增加2d6。

Seashell of Stolen Sound.name: Seashell of Stolen Sound
Seashell of Stolen Sound.description:
Trigger A creature within range begins to make a sound.

You store a sound in a seashell to use as you will: the last words of a loved one, a dragon's mighty roar, the compromising conversation between two powerful diplomats, or even more strange and secret. As part of Casting this Spell, you must present an unbroken seashell. When you Cast the Spell, magic swirls around the triggering creature, copying the sounds they make, as well as any background noise, for the next minute and storing them in the seashell.

You or another creature can then play the sound back from the seashell during the spell's duration by Interacting with the seashell, but once the sounds have been played back, the seashell shatters and the spell ends.

As normal for spells with a duration until your next daily preparations, you can choose to continue expending the spell slot to prolong the duration of an existing seashell of stolen sound for another day. While the spell faithfully copies the sounds around the target, it doesn't reproduce any special auditory or sonic effects of the sound.

Secret Chest.name: 秘藏箱 Secret Chest
Secret Chest.description:
你将一个容器和其内容物放逐到灵界位面，你可以之后再将其收回。容器的物理特性，其制作材料，任何锁，以及其他特征，与此法术的施放无关，但该容器无法容纳任何生物。当你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放该法术 Cast this Spell}时，该容器及其内容会被传送到灵界位面深处的随机位置。对于容器和其内容物，时间如常流逝，并且灵界位面的环境效果对其生效。虽然不太可能，但在灵界位面的生物有可能被该箱子绊到。

你可以 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{解消 Dismiss}该法术，令该箱子回到你当前的位置。如果该法术由于其他原因结束，该容器在灵界位面中遗失，你无法通过该法术将其找回，但你可以通过其他方式找到它。

Secret Page.name: 秘密文页 Secret Page
Secret Page.description: 你令目标的上的文本转变成完全不同的文本。如果该文本是法术书或者卷轴，你可以令其显示为一个你知道的，且环级低于秘密文页的法术。该替换后的法术无法被施放，或者用于准备一个法术。你也可以将该文本转变为其他你已经写过或者能够取得的文本。你可以指定一个密语，接触该书页的生物能通过该密语将文本变回原样以及替换回来。如果有，你必须在施放时选择替代文本和密语。

See Invisibility.name: 识破隐形 See Invisibility
See Invisibility.description:
你能看见 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} 的生物和物体。对你而言它们看起来如同半透明一般，并且对你视为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 。

升阶 (5环级) 该法术的持续时间为8小时。

Sending.name: 短讯术 Sending
Sending.description: 你向该生物发送一段25词或者更短的精神信息，并且它能够立即回复一段由他所编纂的25词或者更短的信息。

Sepulchral Mask.name: 阴森面具 Sepulchral Mask
Sepulchral Mask.description:
你呈现出一副超自然的葬仪面具，于1分钟内为你对抗情绪效果的意志豁免骰提供+1状态加值。这副阴森的面容迫使你的敌人直面他们的悔恨和罪恶。任何在你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放该法术 Cast the Spell} 时位于区域内或是在区域内开始其回合的敌人受到 [[/r {1d4}[mental]]]{1d4 心灵伤害}，并且必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物受到一半伤害。

失败 该生物受到全额伤害，并且在对抗情绪效果的意志豁免上承受-1状态罚值，持续1轮。

大失败 该生物受到双倍伤害，并且在对抗情绪效果的意志豁免上承受-1状态罚值，持续1分钟。

升阶 (+2) 心灵伤害增加 [[/r {2d4}[mental]]]{2d4}，弥漫半径增加5尺。

Shadow Army.name: Shadow Army
Shadow Army.description:
You create dozens of semi-real copies of yourself that swarm across the battlefield and fight your enemies. You are virtually indistinguishable from your clones, allowing you to Hide and Sneak among them. An enemy that's in the area when the spell is cast or that ends its turn in the area takes 3d10 mental damage and 3d10 bludgeoning damage, and is possibly inflicted with a condition, depending on the result of its Will save. When you Cast the Spell, you choose a condition your shadows impose on a failed save: @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}.

Critical Success The creature takes no damage. For the duration of the spell, the creature gets a result one step better than it rolled on further saves against the spell, and can distinguish you from your clones without difficulty.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage, and gains the chosen condition.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, and gains the chosen condition.

Shadow Blast.name: 幽影爆破 Shadow Blast
Shadow Blast.description:
你利用暗影位面的半实体物质创造一团爆炸。选择酸，钝击，寒冷，电击，火焰，力场，穿刺，挥砍或者音波伤害，然后选择30尺锥形，120内的15尺爆发或者50尺线形。该爆炸对该区域中的每个生物造成5d8伤害你所选择类型的伤害。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d8。

Shadow Illusion.name: Shadow Illusion
Shadow Illusion.description:
You create a shadowy illusion of a creature or a stationary object, but the illusion can exist only in an area of dim light or darkness. The spell ends if the illusion is ever out of an area of dim light or darkness. If the illusion is an object, it must fit within a 20-foot burst, and the creature can be of any size up to Gargantuan, filling a 20-foot-by-20-foot space.

The object or creature appears to animate naturally; it even generates the appropriate sounds and smells, and feels believable to the touch, though its coloring is always muted.

If the illusion is a creature, shadow illusion has the effects of an @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.f8SBoXiXQjlCKqly]{Illusory Creature} spell of the same level, except it deals [[/r 2d8]] damage plus your spellcasting ability modifier, instead of the amount listed in illusory creature.

Heightened (+2) The area that an illusory object can fit in increases by 10 feet.

The damage of the illusory creature's Strike increases by [[/r 1d8]].

Shadow Jump.name: Shadow Jump
Shadow Jump.description:
You instantly transport yourself from one shadow to another. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.69L70wKfGDY66Mk9]{Teleport} yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space you can see that's in dim light or darkness and within range. You can transport your familiar with this spell, but if shadow jump would bring any other creature with you-even if you're carrying the creature in an extradimensional container-the spell is disrupted.

Heightened (8th) When you arrive at your destination, you can become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} until the end of your next turn or until you are no longer in an area of dim light or darkness, whichever comes first. The invisibility is an illusion effect.

Shadow Projectile.name: Shadow Projectile
Shadow Projectile.description:
Trigger An ally within 20 feet of you makes a ranged attack roll.

You create an illusory duplicate of your ally's ranged attack to confuse your opponents. You launch an illusory double of your ally's projectile or spell at the same target, leaving the enemy unsure which attack to avoid. The target takes 3d8 mental damage, depending on its Will save. Regardless of the result of its save, it's temporarily immune to shadow projectile spells for 1 hour.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the triggering attack.

Failure The creature is flat-footed against the triggering attack and takes full damage from your illusory projectile.

Critical Failure As failure, but double damage.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d8.

Shadow Raid.name: Shadow Raid
Shadow Raid.description:
You spin illusions of flying shadows throughout the area. The shadows strike and cavort, harming your foes and blocking their vision with twisting shadow. Enemies in the area when you Cast the Spell take 6d8 bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, with a basic Reflex or basic Will save, as shadows explode into being. You choose the damage type when you Cast the Spell, and each creature chooses the type of save it attempts before it rolls the save. The shadows then persist in the area for 1 minute, dealing [[/r 3d8]] damage of the type you chose to any enemy that ends its turn in the area. All creatures are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to enemies in the area, as the illusory shadows swarm over them and block light.

A creature that spends an action to Seek or otherwise interact with the shadow raid can attempt a Perception check to disbelieve it. On a success, the creature halves the damage it takes from the shadows, and the shadows no longer impede its vision. These benefits last until the spell ends.

Heightened (9th) The initial damage increases by 2d8, and the damage to a creature that ends its turn in the area increases by [[/r 1d8]].

Shadow Siphon.name: 幽影虹吸 Shadow Siphon
Shadow Siphon.description:
触发 一个法术或者魔法效果造成伤害。

你通过将物质位面的能量和幽影位面的能量交换，令目标法术变成了一种部分为幻术的形式。尝试反制目标法术。如果该尝试成功，任何会被该法术伤害的生物仅承受一半的伤害。但该法术在其他方面如常运作。在这次尝试中，幽影虹吸的反制等级视为高2级。

Shadow Walk.name: 行影术 Shadow Walk
Shadow Walk.description: 你进入幽影位面，使用其空间扭曲的性质来加速旅行。目标通过幽影位面和物质位面的交界处进入幽影位面的边界。目标在幽影位面中无法看见物质位面（但该位面的一些事物可能是物质位面的模糊投影）。在幽影位面中时，目标可能会遭遇到该位面的原住民。在位面交界之间的幽影会折叠空间，能相对物质位面加速你的旅行。每沿着该交界旅行3分钟，目标会如同在物质位面上旅行1小时。在任何时刻，目标可以解消该法术的效果，但这只影响该目标。幽影的折叠是不准确的，所以当法术结束时，目标会出现在物质位面中距离目标地点大致1英里远的地方（但一同旅行并且在幽影位面同一点解消该法术的目标会在同一位置出现）。

Shadow's Web.name: 阴影之网 Shadow's Web
Shadow's Web.description:
你放出了翻涌的黑暗浪潮，这会造成 [[/r {14d4}[negative]]]{14d4 负能量伤害}。每个位于区域内的生物都必须尝试1次强韧豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物承受半额伤害，并陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}，持续1轮。

失败 该生物承受全额伤害，并陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}，持续1轮。

大失败 该生物承受双倍伤害，并且陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} ，持续1轮，此外还会陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} 1轮，或者直至他 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escapes}为止，以较早发生者为准。

升阶 (+1) 负能量伤害增加 [[/r {2d4}[negative]]]{2d4}。

Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout.name: Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout
Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout.description: Calling out the fifth line of the Crimson Oath, you seal your most grievous injuries with a stroke of your blade. The first time each round that you Strike with your weapon and deal damage to a foe, you recover a number of HP equal to twice shall not falter, shall not rout's level. This healing can't raise your current HP above half of your maximum HP.

Shape Stone.name: 塑石术 Shape Stone
Shape Stone.description:
你将目标石块变成你选择的粗糙形状。该塑形过程十分粗糙，无法制造复杂的组件，细致的细节，可动部分，或者其他类似的东西。当你塑形一个石头时，站在其上的生物必须尝试一次反射豁免或者特技（Acrobatics）检定。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 目标在石头上 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} 。

大失败 该生物从石头上摔落（如可能）并且倒地着地。

Shape Wood.name: 塑木术 Shape Wood
Shape Wood.description: 你将目标木头变成你选择的粗糙形状。该塑形能力十分粗糙，无法制造复杂的组件，细致的细节，可动部分，或者其他类似的东西。你无法使用该法术来增加你所塑形的木质物体的价值。

Shapechange.name: 形体变化 Shapechange
Shapechange.description: 借由你强大的变形魔法，你转变为另一种形态。你将自身变为任意的，你通过自身法术库或者你能准备的8环或者更低的变形法术所能变成的形态（包括任何8环级或者更低的你所知的法术的升阶版本）。你在施放法术时选择生物类型，而不是在准备该法术时。你可以使用一个具有专注特征的单动作，改变自身形态为任何一个你可以通过该法术选择的形态；你可以解消该法术。

Share Burden.name: Share Burden
Share Burden.description:
Trigger An ally within 30 feet is about to attempt a saving throw against a harmful emotion effect, and you would not otherwise have to save against the effect.

You shoulder some of your ally's pain. Both you and your ally use the outcome one degree of success better than the result of your ally's saving throw, even if the triggering effect usually affects only one target.

Share Lore.name: Share Lore
Share Lore.description:
You share your knowledge with the touched creatures. Choose one Lore skill in which you are trained. The targets become trained in that Lore skill for the duration of the spell.

Heightened (3rd) The duration of the spell is 1 hour and you can target up to five creatures.

Heightened (5th) The duration of the spell is 8 hours, you can target up to five creatures, and you can share up to two Lore skills in which you are trained.

Shared Nightmare.name: 噩梦链接 Shared Nightmare
Shared Nightmare.description:
你将精神与目标相连，用互相的噩梦替代混乱的视野。你们中一个会 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}，但具体谁困惑会基于目标的意志豁免。

大成功 你困惑1轮。

成功 在你的下个回合开始，你按照困惑状态花费第一个动作，然后正常行动。

失败 如同成功，但是此时为目标受到影响，在每轮第一个动作困惑，而不是你。该持续时间为1分钟。

大失败 目标困惑1分钟。

Shatter.name: 粉碎音波 Shatter
Shatter.description:
高频音波攻击击碎附近的一件物体。你对该物体造成2d10音波伤害，如果物体的硬度为4或者更低，忽视该硬度。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d10，法术所能忽视的硬度增加2。

Shattering Gem.name: Shattering Gem
Shattering Gem.description:
A large gem floats around the target in an erratic pattern. The gem has 5 Hit Points. Each time a creature Strikes the target, the target attempts a DC 11 flat check. On a success, the gem blocks the attack, so the attack first damages the gem and then applies any remaining damage to the target. If the gem is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it shatters, immediately dealing the creature that destroyed it 1d8 slashing damage (basic Reflex save), as long as that creature is within 10 feet of the target.

Heightened (+1) The gem has 5 additional HP, and the damage dealt by its detonation increases by 1d8.

Shepherd of Souls.name: 灵魂牧者 Shepherd of Souls
Shepherd of Souls.description:
你为尚未注定一死之人拉住了命运之手，牺牲了一些你自身的生命力来治愈他们。

你最多通过牺牲失去15点生命值，目标受到的伤害减少你所牺牲生命值的两倍。如果可减少的量超过了当前的伤害总量，那么剩余的量将被用于恢复目标的生命值。

升阶 (+2) 你能牺牲的生命值的上限增加5点。

Shield.name: 护盾术 Shield
Shield.description:
你产生一层魔法护盾。这视同你使用了举盾（Raise a Shield）动作，赋予你在AC上的+1环境加值，直到你的下个回合开始，但这里不需要手来使用。

当该法术生效时，你可以使用你的魔法护盾来进行盾牌格挡（Shield Block）反应动作。该盾牌具有硬度5。在你使用盾牌格挡后，该法术结束，并且你无法在10分钟内再次施放它。不同于常规的盾牌格挡，你可以使用法术的反应动作来对抗魔法飞弹法术。

升阶该法术会增加护盾的硬度。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.Jemq5UknGdMO7b73]{法术效果：护盾术}

升阶 (3环级) 该护盾具有硬度10。

升阶 (5环级) 该护盾具有硬度15。

升阶 (7环级) 该护盾具有硬度20。

升阶 (9环级) 该护盾具有硬度25。

Shield Other.name: 护卫他人 Shield Other
Shield Other.description: 你在目标和自身的生命力之间建立了一种临时连接。目标仅从所有造成生命值伤害的效果中受到一半伤害，你承受剩余部分的伤害。当你通过该链接承受伤害时，你对该伤害不会应用任何抗力，弱点或者其他能力；你仅承受该数值的伤害。如果目标与你的距离超过30尺，该法术结束。如果你或者目标降低到0生命值，在本法术的伤害结算后，该法术结束。

Shielding Strike.name: 盾牌打击 Shielding Strike
Shielding Strike.description:
当你攻击敌人时，防护魔力将你的行动转变为举起盾牌的动力。进行一次近战打击。随后，如果你持有一面盾牌则可以 either @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{举起盾牌} ，如果你拥有@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{护盾术 shield} 则可以释放它。

Note: Conflux spells refresh Spellstrike.

Shift Blame.name: Shift Blame
Shift Blame.description:
Trigger You or another creature attacks a creature or fails at a Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation check.

You alter the target's memories of the triggering event as they form. You choose another creature (which can be you) with the capacity to make the triggering attack or skill check, and you alter the target's memories to recall the creature you chose as responsible for the triggering attack or skill check. The target must attempt a Will save and is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Critical Success The target knows you attempted to alter its memories.

Success The target doesn't realize you attempted to alter its memories, though it knows you cast a spell.

Failure You successfully alter the target's memory. It isn't forced to react to the new memories in a particular way, and it's likely to question them if they contradict other information it knows or are implausible for the situation.

Shifting Form.name: 变形 Shifting Form
Shifting Form.description:
你从后述能力中选择并获得1项能力。你能够解消（Dismiss）该法术。

  • 你的速度获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.j6po934p4jcUVC6l]{20尺状态加值}。
  • 你获得等同于自身速度的 @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.nbW4udOUTrCGL3Gf]{攀爬速度} @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.Um25D1qLtZWOSBny]{游泳速度} 。
  • 你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.A48jNUOAmCljx8Ru]{黑暗视觉}。
  • 你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.14AFzcwkN019dzcl]{一对爪子}。这些灵巧（agile）娴熟（finesse）的非武装（unarmed）攻击造成1d8点挥砍伤害。
  • 你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.byXkHIKFwuKrZ55M]{模糊的60尺灵敏嗅觉}。

Shifting Sand.name: Shifting Sand
Shifting Sand.description:
You cause the surface to heave. The area becomes difficult terrain and any tracks in the area are destroyed by the churning ground. Creatures standing in the area take a -1 status penalty to Acrobatics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balance} and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} and Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump}. The first time each round you Sustain the Spell, you can move the churning area up to 10 feet in any direction. Creatures immobilized by the spell are carried along with the shifting sand in the same direction, if possible; this movement is forced movement. Creatures that enter or begin their turn standing in the shifting sand must attempt a Reflex save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and ignores the area's difficult terrain and penalty to skill checks until the end of its turn.

Success The creature ignores the area's penalty to skill checks until the end of its turn.

Failure The creature is affected normally by the spell this turn.

Critical Failure The creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} within the spell's area until it Escapes. If the creature was already immobilized by shifting sands, it also falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Heightened (5th) The status penalty increases to -2 and the spell's range increases to 60 feet.

Heightened (7th) The status penalty increases to -3, the spell's range increases to 60 feet, and the spell's area increases to a 30-foot burst.

Heightened (9th) The status penalty increases to -4, the spell's range increases to 60 feet, and the spell's area increases to a 40-foot burst.

Shillelagh.name: 橡棍术 Shillelagh
Shillelagh.description:
目标长出叶子和藤蔓，满溢原能能量。目标在你手中时，变为 +1强击（striking）武器，在攻击骰上获得+1物品价值，并且伤害骰子增加到两个。除此之外，只要你位于你的原属位面，你使用目标所作出的对异怪（aberration），异位面（extraplanar）生物，以及不死生物（undead）的攻击，武器伤害骰子增加到三个。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.deG1dtfuQph03Kkg]{法术效果：橡棍术}

Shocking Grasp.name: 电爪 Shocking Grasp
Shocking Grasp.description:
你用闪烁的雷电围绕住你的手掌。尝试一次近战法术攻击骰。命中时，目标承受2d12电击伤害。如果目标正穿戴金属护甲或者由金属组成，你在电爪的攻击骰上获得+1环境加值，并且目标在命中时承受 [[/r {1d4}[persistent,electricity]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续电击伤害} 。在重击时，伤害翻倍，但 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续伤害}不翻倍。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d12，该持续电击伤害增加1。

Shockwave.name: Shockwave
Shockwave.description:
You create a wave of energy that ripples through the earth. Terrestrial creatures in the affected area must attempt a Reflex save to avoid stumbling as the shockwave shakes the ground.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the start of its next turn.

Failure The creature falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Critical Failure As failure, plus the creature takes 1d6 damage.

Heightened (+1) The area increases by 5 feet (to a 20-foot cone at 2nd level, and so on).

Shooting Star.name: 流星击 Shooting Star
Shooting Star.description:
你射出一颗箭矢，其笔直的飞出，在其后留下一条炽热的飞行轨迹。进行一次远程打击，无视目标的隐蔽（conceal）并且此次打击降低一级掩蔽（cover，强效变标准，标准变弱效，弱效变无）。如果打击命中，飞行轨迹悬于空中。直到你的下个回合开始，这会给与对此生物的所有攻击无视隐蔽和降低掩蔽的增益效果。

Note: Conflux spells refresh Spellstrike.

Show the Way.name: Show the Way
Show the Way.description:
You and affected allies gain preternatural knowledge of the path ahead, allowing you to intuit the best way forward and avoid potential obstacles such as difficult or confusing terrain. For the purpose of long-distance overland travel during exploration mode, traveling through difficult terrain reduces you to only three-quarters your travel Speed instead of half, and traveling through greater difficult terrain reduces your travel Speed to only half your travel Speed instead of one-third. Show the way does not prevent you from falling into traps or encountering other artificial obstacles and hazards.

Heightened (+6) For the purpose of long-distance overland travel during exploration mode, traveling through difficult terrain doesn't reduce your travel Speed at all, and traveling through greater difficult terrain reduces your travel Speed to only three-quarters of its normal value instead of one-third.

Shrink.name: 缩小术 Shrink
Shrink.description:
你折叠空间，另一个生物变小。目标体型缩小并变为超小型。其装备随之缩小，但是在脱离后会回复原始大小。该生物的触及变为0尺。该法术对于超小型生物无效。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.LXf1Cqi1zyo4DaLv]{法术效果：缩小术}

升阶 (6环级) 该法术能以至多10个生物为目标。

Shrink Item.name: 缩物术 Shrink Item
Shrink Item.description: 你将目标缩小到大约硬币大小。这会将其负载缩小到可忽略。你可以解消该法术，并且当你将该物体扔到坚硬表面上时法术会结束。该物体在变回正常大小的过程中不能用于攻击或者造成伤害。如果在法术结束时，该物体没有足够的空间复原，法术持续时间会一直持续，直到物体处于一个足以容纳其正常大小的位置。

Shroud of Flame.name: Shroud of Flame
Shroud of Flame.description:
You encircle yourself in an aura of protective flames. Each creature that hits you with an unarmed attack, Grapples you, or otherwise touches you takes [[/r {3}[fire]]]{3 fire damage}. When you Cast the Spell and the first time you sustain it each round, each creature in the area takes [[/r {3d6}[fire]]]{3d6 fire damage} (basic Reflex save).

Heightened (+1) The damage caused by touching you increases by 1, and the fire damage when you Cast the Spell or sustain it increases by 1d6.

Shroud of Night.name: 复眼暗夜 Shroud of Night
Shroud of Night.description:
随着你的手一挥，目标便被套上了黑暗面纱。目标的眼被黑暗所复盖。若你向自愿盟友(例如持有强光至盲特性的生物)施放此法术，该盟友可不掷豁免直接选择结果。无论豁免结果，目标会暂时免疫此法术1分钟。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 目标被模糊的黑暗所笼罩。除非目标持有 @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{黑暗视觉 Darkvision}，其他所有生物对他皆为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

Sigil.name: 魔法印记 Sigil
Sigil.description:
你无害地在目标生物或者物体上设置你独有的魔法印记，它有1平方英寸大。该印记可以是可见的或者隐形的，并且你可以使用一个交互（Interact）动作，接触该目标来令其从隐形转化为可见或从可见转化为隐形。该印记可以通过花费5分钟时间刷洗或者刮擦来除去。如果印记位于一个生物上，它会经过一周自然消去。该印记自然消去前的时间根据你升阶到的环级而改变。

升阶 (3环级) 该印记在1个月后自然消去。

升阶 (5环级) 该印记在1年后自然消去。

升阶 (7环级) 该印记永不消去。

Silence.name: 沉默术 Silence
Silence.description:
目标不会发出声音，令生物无法通过仅通过听觉或其他感官察觉到它。目标无法使用音波攻击，也不能使用具有听觉特征的动作。这令目标无法施放包含语言成分的法术。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术效果从被接触生物弥漫开，令10尺半径内静音，声音也无法穿过，并且阻止影响区域中任何听觉或者音波效果。在该半径中时，生物受到和目标相同的效果。根据效果的位置，一个生物可能会注意到一团缺失的声音正在接近（例如，这阻挡了来自一场聚会的噪音）。

Silver's Refrain.name: Silver's Refrain
Silver's Refrain.description:
The "Song of Silver" was an enchanted song used by the Silver Ravens to battle diabolic forces. You pull from select verses to temporarily replicate some of the legendary song's benefits, albeit on a much smaller scale.

Weapon and unarmed attacks by allies in the area are treated as silver. In addition, this spell automatically attempts to counteract any @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door} cast by a devil within the area or cast by a devil attempting to enter the area using dimension door. If a devil attempts to enter the area using dimension door and the spell is counteracted, the devil remains where it started.

Simulacrum.name: 拟像术 Simulacrum
Simulacrum.description:
你通过活化冰雪并雕塑其表面创造出一个目标生物的幻象复制品。拟像是无特殊能力的4级生物。若它需要尝试检定或使用DC，除了后文所述的部分之外，需要取用怪物的适中数值（moderate number for a monster；见Gamemastery Guide 57页）。拟像没有来自目标的任何特定记忆，但是它能使用任何施法者提供的关于目标生物的信息，并用此来模仿目标。拟像看起来与目标一样，并且在 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{乔装 Impersonate} 目标生物时具有欺骗调整值，该调整值与次要施法者中投掷欺骗检定的人相同，并额外+4点状态加值。

尽管拟像不具有任何目标的原始特殊能力，比如龙的喷吐武器，但是构成拟像的幻象允许它显得好像能使用这些能力一般；只是这些效果似乎永远无法产生实质效果。举例说明，在对抗拟像龙的喷吐武器时，所有区域内的生物看起来都好像在豁免检定中掷出大成功并且不受任何伤害。生物可以进行一次察觉检定对抗次要施法者中投掷欺骗检定的人的欺骗DC，用于尝试不相信幻觉。

大成功 你为拟像赋予了生命。它具有仆从（Minion）特征并且处于你的绝对控制之下。你与拟像会获得直接的精神联系（direct mental link），并且能够通过这种联系来花费1个动作指挥拟像，即便你与他相隔一段距离。

成功 同大成功，但是你与拟像之间没有特殊的联系。你必须花费1个动作来用口头或其他方式来指挥拟像。

失败 仪式失败并且没有任何效果。

大失败 拟像苏醒了，但它不是你的仆从，而且对所有施法者都是敌对态度。它会尽其所能来摧毁施法者，但如果无法立即杀死他们，则会尝试逃脱并计划谋害施法者。

Sleep.name: 睡眠术 Sleep
Sleep.description:
区域中的每个生物昏昏欲睡。由于该法术 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} 的生物不会 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}，也不会松开其持握的东西。该法术不会令生物无法通过觉察醒来，并因此限制其在战斗中的能力。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物在觉察检定上承受-1状态减值，持续1轮。

失败 该生物失去意识。如果它在1分钟后仍然失去意识，它自动醒来。

大失败 该生物失去意识。如果它在1小时候仍然失去意识，它自动醒来。

升阶 (4环级) 目标在失败时失去意识1轮，在大失败时失去意识1分钟。它们会倒地，并松开其持握的东西，并且它们无法尝试觉察检定以醒来。当持续时间结束时，该生物会正常睡着，而不是自动醒来。

Slough Skin.name: Slough Skin
Slough Skin.description:
You continually and harmlessly slough off the top layer of your skin while new skin regenerates immediately, quickly moving damaging substances away from your body. The flat check to remove @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Damage} from effects that coat your skin (such as most persistent acid damage) is reduced to 5, and you gain a +2 status bonus to your initial save against contact poison (but not to further saves, since by that point, the toxin has already entered your system). If you're suffering from an effect other than Persistent Damage that depends on continuous contact with your skin, if that effect allows a saving throw, you receive a new saving throw against that effect at the end of each turn when you attempt your flat checks against Persistent Damage, and you also receive a +2 status bonus to those saving throws.

While affected by this spell, your continually shedding skin makes you much easier to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track}. Anyone Tracking you gains a +2 circumstance bonus to do so, and you cannot Hide Your Tracks.

Slow.name: 缓慢术 Slow
Slow.description:
你令目标周围的时间膨胀，令其行动缓慢。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} ，持续1轮。

失败 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，持续1分钟。

大失败 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2}，持续1分钟。

升阶 (6环级) 你能以至多10个生物为目标。

Snare Hopping.name: 传送圈套 Snare Hopping
Snare Hopping.description:
你可能没能把圈套设置在正确的位置，但你能凭借魔法把它挪过去。你将目标圈套传送至魔法范围内的其他无人占据的地点（unoccupied location）。

升阶 (+1) 法术的范围增加10尺。

Snowball.name: Snowball
Snowball.description:
You throw a magically propelled and chilled ball of dense snow. The target takes 2d4 cold damage and potentially other effects, depending on the result of your spell attack roll.

Critical Success The target takes double damage and a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Success The target takes full damage and a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Failure No effect.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d4.

Solid Fog.name: 重雾术 Solid Fog
Solid Fog.description: 你创造一团浓密到足以阻碍移动和视力的雾气团。这如同 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{隐雾术 Obscuring Mist}一般，除了该区域也会成为困难地形。你可以解消该法术。

Sonata Span.name: Sonata Span
Sonata Span.description: By playing a brief tune on an instrument or in song, you cause the notes of the melody to physically manifest into a shimmering, translucent path. This path doesn't need to be over solid ground and can tilt up or down diagonally up to 45 degrees, but it must be a straight, 5-foot-wide line. It can support as many creatures as can physically fit on the bridge.

Song of Marching.name: 行军乐 Song of Marching
Song of Marching.description:
Y你持续一场轻快的表演来让盟友不断前行。你和区域内的盟友可以在法术持续时间内 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JuqmIAnkL9hVGai8]{强行军 Hustle} ，即便你在此过程中需要 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{维持法术 Sustaining the Spell}也可以强行军。你和你的盟友之后会在1日内临时免疫（temporarily immune）该法术。

升阶 (6环级) 你能维持法术的时间增加至2小时。

升阶 (9环级) 你能维持法术的时间增加至4小时。

Song of Strength.name: 力量之歌 Song of Strength
Song of Strength.description:
你用发自内心的劝勉激发盟友的体能。你和你的盟友在运动检定、以及运动技能动作的DC上（比如 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{卸武 Disarm}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔拌 Trip}）获得+1状态加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.8adLKKzJy49USYJt]法术效果：力量之歌}

特殊 若你具有 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kF0rs9mCPvJGfAZE]{激发英勇 Inspire Heroics} 组曲法术，你便能使用该组曲来提升力量之歌的加值，使用和强化激发勇气（inspire courage）或者激发防御（inspire defense）一样相同的方式。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.Fjnm1l59KH5YJ7G9]{激发英勇（成功）}, @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.8XaSpienzVXLmcfp]{激发英勇（大成功）}

Song of the Fallen.name: Song of the Fallen
Song of the Fallen.description:
You chant a dirge or an elegy that either rouses the dead to action or reminds undead that they should lay to rest.

If you target dead creatures, the bodies animate and can continue acting as if they were alive. A creature animated in this way has 60 temporary Hit Points. The animated creatures are slowed 1 but can otherwise act normally. Creatures animated with this spell die again once the spell ends.

If you target undead creatures, each undead must attempt a basic Will save.

Critical Success The undead takes 5d6 positive damage.

Success The undead takes 10d6 positive damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Failure The undead takes 100 positive damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The undead is destroyed.

Soothe.name: 安抚术 Soothe
Soothe.description:
你安抚目标的精神，增强其精神防御并治愈其伤口。目标在你施放该法术时，回复1d10+4生命值，并且在持续时间中，目标对抗心灵效果的豁免上获得+2状态加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.nkk4O5fyzrC0057i]{法术效果：安抚术}

升阶 (+1) 该治疗量增加1d10+4。

Soothing Ballad.name: 抚慰叙事诗 Soothing Ballad
Soothing Ballad.description:
你获取缪斯的力量，抚慰你的盟友。选择以下三个效果之一

  • 法术尝试反制目标身上的恐惧效果。
  • 法术尝试反制目标身上的强制麻痹效果。
  • 法术给目标回复7d8生命值

升阶 (+1) 用来治疗的情况下，抚慰叙事诗可以恢复额外1d8生命值

Soothing Blossoms.name: Soothing Blossoms
Soothing Blossoms.description:
Blossoms grow from the ground in a small area, soothing away afflictions and persistent pains and harm. When any creature in that area rolls a successful save against a poison or disease effect, it gets a critical success instead. The blossoms grant assisted recovery to everyone in the area to end their persistent damage, both when the spell is cast and at the start of each of your turns. Once the duration ends, the flowers lose their magical effect, but a few of them might survive in the area as long as they can naturally. This spell doesn't give a benefit on a save against an affliction unless the stage lasts 10 minutes or less.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.nIryhRgeiacQw1Em]{Spell Effect: Soothing Blossoms}

Soothing Mist.name: 抚慰迷雾 Soothing Mist
Soothing Mist.description:
你呼出一团正能量构成的魔法迷雾包裹1个生物。

迷雾会为目标活物恢复 [[/r {2d8}[healing]]]{2d8 生命值} ，并终止正在影响该活物的单一来源的持续酸（acid）、流血（bleed）、火焰（fire）、负能量（negative）或毒素（poison）伤害。若该生物正在承受的持续伤害有多个来源，则由你选择移除其中哪个。

当该法术用于对抗不死目标时，你会造成2d8点 [[/r {2d8}[positive]]]{2d8 正能量伤害} （基础强韧豁免）；若豁免失败，该目标还会承受 [[/r {2}[persistent,positive]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续正能量伤害}。

升阶 (+1) 治疗量（或对不死目标的伤害量）增加。 [[/r 1d8]]，不死生物所受到的持续正能量伤害增加1点。

Soothing Spring.name: Soothing Spring
Soothing Spring.description:
Steam wisps into the air as a stone-lined pool appears in the ground and fills with hot water that bubbles up from the earth. The water is comfortably hot and smells mildly sulfurous in a not-unpleasant way. You are able to draw out the full energizing potential of the mineral-rich water. Any creature that spends the full hour soaking in the hot spring or basking in the mud from the bottom of the pit regains 10d8 Hit Points and feels refreshed, losing the fatigued condition. As normal for effects that remove fatigue, this doesn't remove any underlying source of fatigue, such as lack of sleep, causing the condition to return if the underlying source isn't addressed.

The pool is 20 feet on each side, and it's 5 feet deep. It can contain 16 Medium or smaller creatures at a time. A Large creature counts as eight Medium creatures and a Huge creature fills the entire pool. This pool has the structure trait and the same restrictions as magic items that create structures.

Heightened (+1) The healing increases by 2d8.

Soothing Words.name: 慰心之语 Soothing Words
Soothing Words.description:
你尝试用安慰语气念出平复的词句来安定目标。目标在意志豁免骰上获得+1状态加值。该加值在对抗情绪效果时增加到+2。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.an4yZ6dyIDOFa1wa]{法术效果：慰心之语}

除此之外，当你施放该法术时，你可以尝试反制一个目标上的情绪效果。

升阶 (5环级) 该对豁免的加值增加到+2，对抗情绪效果时为+3。

Soul Siphon.name: 灵魂虹吸 Soul Siphon
Soul Siphon.description:
你吸取目标一部分灵魂来滋养自身。目标必须尝试一次强韧豁免检定并受到1d4点负能量伤害。你获得等于目标因此损失的HP数的临时HP，若目标因该法术获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained}状态，流失的HP亦提供临时HP。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标只受一半伤害。

失败 目标受到完整伤害且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。

大失败 目标受到双倍伤害且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}。

升阶 (+1) 伤害增加1d4点。

Sound Burst.name: 音鸣爆 Sound Burst
Sound Burst.description:
刺耳的噪音迸裂而出，造成2d10音波伤害。每个生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物承受一半伤害。

失败 该生物承受完整伤害，并且 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} 1轮。

大失败 该生物承受双倍伤害，获得耳聋1分钟，并且 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d10。

Speak with Animals.name: 动物交谈 Speak with Animals
Speak with Animals.description: 你可以对动物提出问题，从动物获得回答，以对动物及使用交涉（Diplomacy）技能。该法术不会令动物比正常更为友好。聪明的动物喜欢简要直说或者避而不谈，不那么聪明的则通常会做出傻瓜式的回复。

Speak with Plants.name: 植物交谈 Speak with Plants
Speak with Plants.description: 你可以对植物提出问题，从植物获得回答，但该法术不会令植物比正常更为友好或者比正常更有智慧。大多数通常植物对周围的世界仅有直觉的认识，所以它们无法认出生物的细节，或者了解任何其周围环境以外的世界。聪明的植物怪物喜欢简要直说或者避而不谈，不那么聪明的则通常会做出傻瓜式的回复。

Speaking Sky.name: Speaking Sky
Speaking Sky.description: The air speaks to you. You can precisely sense any motion within 60 feet through vibration and air movement.

Spectral Hand.name: 幽灵手 Spectral Hand
Spectral Hand.description: 你利用自身生命力创造出一个半实体的手，它能为你传递接触法术。当你施放一个具有接触射程的法术时，你可以令这只手沿着地面爬行到射程中的一个目标，接触该目标，然后爬回到你这里。当你通过这只手尝试一次近战法术攻击时，你使用你通常的加值。该手可以在射程内移动任意远。该手具有你的AC和豁免，但是任何对这只手的伤害会将其摧毁，并对你造成1d6伤害。

Spell Immunity.name: 法术免疫 Spell Immunity
Spell Immunity.description: 你保护目标免受一个法术的效果影响。选择一个法术，作为语言成分的一部分大声念出其名称。每当法术免疫的目标成为所念出名字的法术的目标或者处于该法术的区域内时，法术免疫会尝试反制该法术。通过法术免疫成功反制以区域为目标或者具有数个目标的法术时，仅取消对法术免疫所影响的目标的效果。

Spell Turning.name: 法术反转 Spell Turning
Spell Turning.description: 该防护法术会将对你施放的法术反射给其施法者。当一个法术指定你为目标时，你可以花费一个反应动作来尝试反射它。此处使用反制该法术的规则，但如果该法术成功被反制，该法术会反射给施法者。无论反制尝试是否成功，法术反转在那之后结束。法术反转无法影响没有目标的法术（例如区域法术）。如果法术反转反射了一个同样处于法术反转影响下的施法者，其法术反转亦可以尝试将它自己的法术再反射给你；如果它们如此做，其反制检定自动成功。

Spellmaster's Ward.name: Spellmaster's Ward
Spellmaster's Ward.description:
Duration sustained up to 1 minute

You create one or more glowing protective runes that revolve around you. For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, increase the number of runes you create by one, to a maximum of three runes for 3 actions.

When you next take damage from a spell, a rune is expended to prevent [[/r {2d6}[damage]]]{2d6 of that spell's damage}. If damage from the triggering spell remains, additional runes are expended until the damage is completely negated, or until all runes have been spent, whichever comes first.

Heightened (+1) Each rune prevents an additional [[/r {1}[damage]]]{1 damage}.

Spellwrack.name: 法力迸裂 Spellwrack
Spellwrack.description:
你令对目标施放的法术泄露出伤害性的能量涌动。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 每当目标被具有持续时间的法术影响时，该目标承受 [[/r {2d12}[persistent,force]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续力场伤害}。每当其从法力迸裂承受力场伤害时，它减少影响其的法术持续时间1轮。仅有通过一次对抗你的法术DC的奥法（Arcana）检定才能领目标从该 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续伤害}中恢复；该诅咒和持续伤害在1分钟之后结束。

失败 如同成功，但是该诅咒和持续伤害不会自己结束。

大失败 如同失败，但是持续力场伤害为 [[/r {4d12}[persistent,force]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续力场伤害}.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行术 Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description:
该生物的手与脚上长出粘附性的细毛，能在几乎任何表面上提供附着力。目标获得等于其速度的攀爬速度。

升阶 (5环级) 该持续时间增加到1小时。

Spider Sting.name: 蛛咬术 Spider Sting
Spider Sting.description:
你使用魔法重现了蜘蛛的剧毒叮咬。你对接触到的生物造成1d4穿刺伤害，并且令其感染蜘蛛毒。目标必须尝试一次强韧豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标承受1d4毒素伤害。

失败 目标感染蜘蛛毒并到达阶段1。

大失败 目标感染蜘蛛毒并到达阶段2。

蜘蛛毒 Spider Venom (毒素)

等级 1;

最大持续时间 4 轮

阶段 1 [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4 毒素伤害} 并且 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段 2 [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4 毒素伤害} 并且 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1轮)

Spike Stones.name: 刺石术 Spike Stones
Spike Stones.description:
长而尖锐的岩石尖刺从区域中的地面迸出。该区域变为困难地形和危险地形。在地面上移动穿过该区域的生物，每进入该区域中的一个方格，承受3穿刺伤害。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1。

Spinning Staff.name: 舞杖术 Spinning Staff
Spinning Staff.description:
你回旋挥动自己的木杖，攻击两个敌人，并且将攻击的动力转变为你下次 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QDW9H8XLIjuW2fE4]{法术打击}充能所需的魔法能量。 用你的木杖对一个敌人进行近战打击，随后对另一个敌人进行第二次近战打击。你的多次攻击减值照常运用到两次攻击。

Note: Conflux spells refresh Spellstrike.

Spirit Blast.name: 灵魂冲击 Spirit Blast
Spirit Blast.description:
你集中以太能量，攻击目标的灵魂，造成16d6力场伤害。由于灵魂冲击影响该生物的灵魂，它可以伤害投射其意识的目标（例如通过投影术（project image））或者占据其他生物的目标，即使该目标的躯体在其他地方。该被占据的生物不会被该冲击伤害。该冲击不会伤害没有灵魂的生物，例如构装体。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加2d6。

Spirit Link.name: 灵魂链接 Spirit Link
Spirit Link.description:
你和其他生物建立了一条灵魂链接，令你代为承受其苦痛。当你施放该法术，以及在你回合开始时，如果目标生命值低于其最大生命值，它回复2生命值（或者其当前生命值和最大生命值的差值，如果这更低）。你失去等于目标回复量的生命值。

这是一种基于灵魂的转移，所以没有任何效果会增加目标获得的生命值或者减少你失去的生命值。这种转移也会忽略你或者目标所拥有的任何临时生命值。由于该效果中没有任何正能量或者负能量作用，灵魂链接在你或者目标为不死生物时也生效。在持续时间中，你不会从再生或者快速治疗中受益。你可以解消该法术，并且一旦你为0生命值，灵魂链接自动结束。

升阶 (+1) 每次转移的生命值增加2。

Spirit Object.name: Spirit Object
Spirit Object.description:
Using a sliver of Baba Yaga's power, you briefly bring an object to life. The object gains a means of locomotion, such as sprouting chicken legs, and Strides up to 25 feet to a space you decide within range. If you spent 2 actions Casting the Spell, the object then attacks one creature of your choice adjacent to its new space. Make a melee spell attack roll against the creature. On a success, the creature takes bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage (as appropriate for the object) equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier, and on a critical success, it takes double damage.

Heightened (+1) Increase the maximum Bulk of the target by 1 and the damage by 1d4.

Spirit Sense.name: 精魂感知 Spirit Sense
Spirit Sense.description:
你向玄妙的世界打开心灵，令你能够感受到附近的精魂。即使你没有在 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{搜索 Searching}，你也会获得一个检定来发现区域中的作祟（haunts）和精魂（spirits）。你在关于作祟和精魂的后续检定上获得+1状态加值：用以 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}的察觉（Perception）检定，尝试 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.B2BpIZFHoF9Kjzpx]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge}，判断其存在原因的技能检定，解除作祟的技能检定。你在对抗作祟和精魂的AC和豁免骰上也会获得+1状态加值。

升阶 (6环级) 该法术持续时间为直到下次你进行你的日常准备。

Spirit Song.name: 灵魂挽歌 Spirit Song
Spirit Song.description:
你诡异的歌声释放出以太能量构成的脉冲，攻击区域中生物的灵魂，造成18d6力场伤害。由于灵魂挽歌影响该生物的灵魂，它可以伤害投射其意识的目标（例如通过投影术（project image））或者占据其他生物的目标，即使该目标的躯体在其他地方。灵魂挽歌的震撼波会穿过固体障碍，但不会穿透，因而会伤害躲在区域内固体物体中的虚体生物，但不会继续穿透伤害对面房间的生物。被占据的生物不会被歌声伤害。该歌声不会伤害没有灵魂的生物，例如构装体。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加2d6。

Spirit Veil.name: 灵魂纱幕 Spirit Veil
Spirit Veil.description:
你在自己的周身蒙上了一层封闭的灵魂纱幕，为你阻挡了生物的视线——尤其是不死生物。你对所有生物都为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}，并且无论不死生物拥有何种感官你都对他们 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}；这赋予你 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{隐形术 Invisibility}的效果，但是可以对抗所有不死生物的精确感官。如果你与不死生物发生物理 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{接触 Interact} ，或者使用敌对行动，法术终止。

升阶 (+1) 你额外将30尺内的一名生物选为目标。任何目标与不死生物发生物理接触或者使用敌对行动都将使法术终止。

Spiritual Anamnesis.name: Spiritual Anamnesis
Spiritual Anamnesis.description:
Memories of a past life that seem incredibly real (and may even be) overwhelm the target's mind. This is especially disorienting for undead and creatures that have lived a previous life (such as celestials, fiends, monitors, and many other extraplanar creatures); if such creatures roll a critical success on their save, they get a success instead, and if they roll a failure, they get a critical failure instead.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute and babbles about the visions, possibly providing information about what they saw.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}.

Spiritual Attunement.name: Spiritual Attunement
Spiritual Attunement.description:
You attune yourself to a spiritual plane of the Outer Sphere, connecting your spirit without fully transporting to it. Your Strikes and spells gain the alignment traits of the plane you chose, which deals additional damage to creatures with a weakness to either of those alignment traits. Furthermore, the plane protects you from energy of the alignments that oppose the plane. You gain resistance 5 to damage of the alignments that oppose those of your chosen plane. For example, if you chose Heaven, your Strikes would gain the good and lawful traits, and you would gain resistance to chaotic and evil. If you choose the Boneyard, the resistance is to negative and positive damage instead.

Heightened (+2) The resistance increases by 5.

The nine main planes of the Outer Sphere are the homes of many deities, celestials, monitors, and fiends. Their names, along with their alignments, are: Heaven (LG), Nirvana (NG), Elysium (CG), Axis (LN), the Boneyard (N), the Maelstrom (CN), Hell (LE), Abaddon (NE), and the Abyss (CE).

Spiritual Epidemic.name: 灵魂灾疫 Spiritual Epidemic
Spiritual Epidemic.description:
你诅咒目标，毁坏其灵魂，并在其生命中留下感染性的陷阱。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。当任何生物对被灵魂灾疫影响的目标释放神术或者异能法术时，必须也尝试一次意志豁免。该诅咒会如此继续传播。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} 持续1轮。

失败 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} 持续1分钟并且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} 持续永久

大失败 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 3} 持续1分钟并且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} 持续永久

Spiritual Guardian.name: 灵能守卫 Spiritual Guardian
Spiritual Guardian.description:
一位由魔法力量构成的中型守卫攻击现身，并攻击你指定的射程内的敌人。灵能守卫是半透明的，并且看起来正持握你的神祇的偏好武器。

当施放该法术时，灵能守卫会出现在与你选择的在射程内的敌人所相邻的未被占据空间，并且对其进行一次打击（Strike）。每当你维持该法术时，你可以将灵能守卫移动到射程内一个目标相邻的空间（如果需要）并且对其进行一次打击（Strike）。该守卫使用你的多次攻击减值，并且计入你的多次攻击减值。另外，当你维持该法术时，你可以令该守卫移动到一个盟友旁边并保护该盟友。你如此做时，每当该盟友将承受伤害，该守卫会代替你的盟友承受最初10点伤害。直到你移动该守卫来攻击敌人或者保护一个不同的盟友，或者直到守卫被摧毁（它具有50生命值，并且无法被任何方式回复生命值），它会一直保护该盟友。除了在保护一个盟友时，该守卫无法通常地承受伤害，但 解离术 Disintegrate 会在命中灵能守卫（AC为25）时自动摧毁它。

守卫的打击（Strike）是近战法术攻击。无论守卫的武器外形如何，该守卫造成等于2d8加上你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害，但你也能改为造成其持握的武器通常所造成类型的伤害，而不是力场伤害。武器的其他特征和数据不会生效，远程武器也只能攻击相邻的生物。除了进行的是法术攻击，灵能守卫的武器对于触发条件，抗力和其他能力而言是一件武器。

该守卫会占据空间，并且盟友能利用其来造成夹击，但它相比正常生物而言，除了生命值没有其他任何特性，并且生物能够穿过其占据空间不受阻碍。除了其打击（Strike）以外，该守卫不能尝试其他任何攻击，并且影响武器或者增强盟友的专长或者法术对守卫无效。

升阶 (+2) 守卫的伤害增加1d8，生命值增加20。

Spiritual Weapon.name: 灵能武器 Spiritual Weapon
Spiritual Weapon.description:
由纯粹的魔法力量构成的武器出现，并攻击你指定的射程内的敌人。该武器看起来若隐若现，并且展现为你的神祇的偏好武器的形态。

当施放该法术时，该武器会出现在与你选择的在射程内的敌人所相邻的未被占据空间，并且对其进行一次打击（Strike）。每当你维持该法术时，你可以将该武器移动到射程内一个新的目标（如果需要）并且对其进行一次打击（Strike）。该灵能武器使用你的多次攻击减值，并且计入你的多次攻击减值。

该武器的打击（Strike）是近战法术攻击。无论其外观为何，该武器造成1d8+你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害。你可以造成通常该武器所造成类型的伤害，而不是力场伤害（或者对于多用武器而言，任何其可用的伤害类型）。武器的其他数据和特征不会生效，远程武器也只能攻击相邻的生物。除了进行的是法术攻击，灵能武器对于触发条件，抗力和其他类似情况而言是一件武器。

该武器不会占据空间，赋予夹击，并且不会具有任何生物会有的属性数据。除了该武器的打击（Strike）以外，它不能尝试其他任何攻击，并且影响武器的专长或者法术对该武器不生效。

升阶 (+2) 该武器的伤害增加1d8。

Splash of Art.name: 艺术喷涌 Splash of Art
Splash of Art.description:
具有颜色的幻象绘画，工具，或者其他艺术符号和工艺瓶在区域中涌现并漂浮。骰1d4决定幻术的颜色。每个该区域中的生物必须尝试一次意志豁免。在成功时，生物不受影响。在失败或者大失败时，该生物承受表格中对应颜色列出的结果。

艺术喷涌 Splash of Art

1d4颜色失败大失败
1白@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}1轮目眩1分钟
2红@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} 持续1轮@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} 持续1轮
3黄色@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}
4蓝@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} 持续1轮@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} 持续1轮

Split the Tongue.name: Split the Tongue
Split the Tongue.description:
The deceiving creature's tongue splits like a serpent's tongue. The creature takes 1d8 slashing damage and must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for [[/r 1d4]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature takes double damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for [[/r 1d4]]{1d4 rounds}.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

Spout.name: Spout
Spout.description:
Area 5-foot cube or 5-foot burst

Water blasts upward, coming out of the ground, rising from a pool, or even manifesting from thin air. Any creatures in the area take bludgeoning damage equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier, with a basic Reflex saving throw.

You can change this spell's area to a 5-foot burst, provided you center the burst in a body of water. This body of water can be as small as a pond or creek, but not as small as a puddle or bathtub.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Spray of Stars.name: 小星喷射 Spray of Stars
Spray of Stars.description:
你掷出许多小星星，造成1d4点火焰伤害。区域内所有生物必须进行反射豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物只受一半伤害，@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} 1轮。

失败 生物受到完整伤害，目眩3轮。

大失败 生物受到双倍伤害，目眩1分钟。

升阶 (+1) 伤害增加1d4点。

Stabilize.name: 稳定伤势 Stabilize
Stabilize.description: 正能量将目标从鬼门关拉回。目标失去 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{濒死 Dying} 状态，但它仍然 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}，并为0生命值。

Stasis.name: Stasis
Stasis.description:
The flow of time congeals around an object or creature, holding it in place. The target must attempt a Will save (an unattended object automatically critically fails its save).

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} as time thickens around it.

Failure Time ceases to pass for the target for 1 round. It is invulnerable to all damage, it cannot be targeted or affected by anything, and no rounds elapse for any timed durations, conditions, afflictions, and other effects it has. While in stasis, the target can't be moved, and it remains fixed in place, defying gravity if need be.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is held in stasis for 3 rounds. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a Will save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round or end it entirely on a critical success.

Statuette.name: Statuette
Statuette.description:
This ritual is a variant of the shrink item spell that allows for the transformation of significantly larger items. You transform the object into a tiny statuette of itself that is Light Bulk. The ritual does not shrink any creatures inside or on top of the item when it is transformed. The item remains in statuette form until the ritual's duration expires or until a creature places it on a stable surface and uses a 10-minute activity to Interact with the item to enlarge it. When restored to its normal size, the object simply pushes other creatures and objects aside or harmlessly contains them, as a magic item with the structure trait.

Your Arcana check determines how long the object remains in statuette form.

Critical Success The object remains a statuette for 1 week.

Success The object remains a statuette for 1 day.

Failure You fail to shrink the object.

Critical Failure You fail to shrink the object, and the highest-level item you carry of light Bulk or more shrinks to a tiny, unusable figurine of itself, weighing negligible bulk, for 1 week.

Status.name: 关照术 Status
Status.description:
只要你和目标处于相同的位面，并且均活着，你就会一直知晓其当前状态。你知晓目标和你相对的方向，与你的距离，以及任何正影响其的状态。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术的射程增加到30尺，并且你能以至多10个生物为目标。

Steal Shadow.name: 偷阴窃影 Steal Shadow
Steal Shadow.description:
你偷走了一名生物的影子，使其变得衰弱。目标必须尝试一次强韧豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}，持续1轮。

失败目标受到 [[/r {3d4}[negative]]]{3d4 负能量伤害} ，并且因为你将其影子抽走并且捏在了手里，目标在法术持续时间内 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}。在之后的轮中，当你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{维持该法术 Sustain the Spell}时，你可以紧扼住影子从而对目标造成 [[/r {3d4}[negative]]]{3d4 负能量伤害} （基础强韧豁免）。在法术结束前，目标不会投射出影子。

大失败 如同失败，但是目标 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}。

升阶 (+1) 法术施放和维持时造成的伤害增加 [[/r {1d4}[negative]]]{1d4}。

Steal the Sky.name: Steal the Sky
Steal the Sky.description:
Trigger You make a successful unarmed Strike against a flying creature.

You deny a flying creature the support of the air.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The target descends 60 feet. If it hits a surface, it takes bludgeoning damage as if it had fallen.

Failure As success, and if the target hits a surface, it falls prone and can't @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.fI20AVwOzJMHXRdo]{Levitate}, or otherwise leave the ground for 1 minute.

Critical Failure As failure, and the creature takes double damage from hitting a surface.

Heightened (+1) Increase the distance the creature must descend by 20 feet.

Stinking Cloud.name: 臭云术 Stinking Cloud
Stinking Cloud.description:
你在目标区域中创造一团腐臭的云雾。这如同 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{隐雾术 Obscuring Mist} 一般，除了在云雾中结束回合的生物会恶心。（此处 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 效果不是毒素效果。）

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

失败 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}，并且在云内时获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

大失败 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}，并且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}直到离开云。

Stoke the Heart.name: 热血满腔 Stoke the Heart
Stoke the Heart.description:
目标的心绪充满热忱，每招每式都获得神威加持。目标在伤害骰上获得+2状态加值。法术结束后，目标会暂时免疫此法术1分钟。

升阶 (+2) 在伤害上的状态加值提升+1。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.TpVkVALUBrBQjULn]{法术效果：热血满腔}

Stone Lance.name: Stone Lance
Stone Lance.description:
You conjure a jagged lance of stone and then launch it at a foe. Make a spell attack roll against the target. On a hit, you deal 6d6 piercing damage and the lance impales the creature, giving it a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds unless it Escapes. On a critical hit, if the creature is on the ground, the lance also embeds into the ground and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilizes} the creature until it Escapes. A creature that Escapes after being impaled takes [[/r {3}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}. When the spell ends, the lance crumbles into dirt, freeing the target if it hasn't Escaped.

Heightened (+1) Increase the damage by 2d6 and the persistent bleed damage for Escapes by 1.

Stone Tell.name: 石言术 Stone Tell
Stone Tell.description: 你可以对自然或者加工过的石头提出问题，以及从石头获得回答。虽然石头没有智力，但你是和石头的自然精魂对话，其人格受石头类型，对于加工过的石头而言是石头所处于的建筑类型影响。石头的视角，认知，和知识令其世界观与人类截然不同，它与人关注的重点相去甚远。石头通常能回答关于过去接触了它的生物，以及他的下面或者后面藏匿着何物的问题。

Stone to Flesh.name: 解除石化 Stone to Flesh
Stone to Flesh.description: 通过操控物质的基本粒子，你将石头转变为血肉。你将被 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{石化 Petrified}的生物转变会其正常状态，或者将一块石头物体转变为一团形状差不多的没有生命的血肉（但没有石头的硬度）。

Stoneskin.name: 石肤术 Stoneskin
Stoneskin.description:
目标的皮肤如岩石般坚硬。它获得对物理伤害的抗力5，除了精金。每当目标被钝击，穿刺或者挥砍攻击命中时，石肤术的持续时间减少1轮。

升阶 (6环级) 该抗力提高到10。

升阶 (8环级) 该抗力提高到15。

升阶 (10环级) 该抗力提高到20。

Storm Lord.name: 风暴之主 Storm Lord
Storm Lord.description:
你头顶的天空在顷刻间昏暗下来，不详的乌云伴随着阵阵电闪雷鸣盘旋其中。当你每轮维持法术时，能够从后述效果中选择其一，使其发生在法术区域内。

  • 镇静 Calm 无额外效果。
  • 起雾 Fog 浓雾四起，区域内被 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{隐雾术 Obscuring Mist}的效果所遮蔽。
  • 降雨 Rain 倾盆大雨从天而降，这会熄灭所有普通的火焰。区域内的生物会在特技（Acrobatics）和察觉（Perception）检定中承受-2点环境减值。
  • 突风 Wind 强风从各个方向向着区域内袭来。远程攻击（Ranged attacks）承受-4点环境减值，所有正在飞行的都被视作逆风（against the wind），而且被视为在困难地形中移动。

此外，每轮1次，你都能使用1个具有专注和操作特征的单动作，来呼唤一道闪电，轰击范围（range）内你能看到的任何目标。你会对目标造成10d6点电击伤害；目标必须尝试1次基本反射豁免（basic Reflex save），失败时目标还会 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} 1轮。

Storm of Vengeance.name: 复仇风暴 Storm of Vengeance
Storm of Vengeance.description:
巨大的的风暴在360尺爆发范围的空中形成。在风暴下，大雨瓢泼，暴风对物理远程攻击和武器远程攻击造成-4环境减值，并且区域中的空中对飞行生物而言视为艰难地形。当你施放该法术以及每轮第一次你维持该法术时，你可以选择下列一个暴风效果。你不能连续选择两次相同的效果。

  • 酸雨 Acid Rain 风暴中的每个生物承受4d8酸伤害，无豁免。
  • 冰雹 Hail 风暴对其下方生物造成4d10钝击伤害（基础强韧豁免）。
  • 闪电 Lightning 至多10道闪电从天而降，目标为你选择的风暴中的生物。一个生物最多仅能被一道闪电作为目标。每道闪电造成7d6闪电伤害（基础反射豁免）。
  • 风雨 Rain and Wind 狂风暴雨令移动困难，可见度低下，这使暴风下的区域成为困难地形，并令任何区域内部或者透过该区域所看到的东西处于 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。
  • 滚雷 Thunderclap 在风暴中的每个生物必须成功通过一次强韧豁免，否则 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} 10分钟。成功豁免的生物会暂时免疫复仇风暴的滚雷1小时。

升阶 (10环级) 该射程增大至2200尺，云的大小为1000尺爆发。

Stormburst.name: Stormburst
Stormburst.description:
Your voice projects like cracking thunder as you summon a localized storm, creating a fearsome surge of lightning and wind that deals 6d6 electricity damage. Each creature must attempt a Reflex saving throw.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, is knocked prone, and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (7th) The damage increases to 8d6, and targets who critically fail are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

Heightened (9th) The damage increases to 10d6, and targets who critically fail are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}.

Stormwind Flight.name: 风暴飞行 Stormwind Flight
Stormwind Flight.description:
强劲的气流带着你穿过天空，使你获得与自身速度相同的飞行速度。若在法术的持续时间结束时仍在飞行的话，你会飘到地面上，就如同 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{羽落术 Feather Fall}一般。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.8GUkKvCeI0xljCOk]{法术效果：风暴飞行}

升阶 (6环级) 当你使用风暴飞行法术飞行时，你不会将逆风飞行（flying against the wind）视为困难地形。

Strange Geometry.name: 奇异几何 Strange Geometry
Strange Geometry.description:
你令该区域扭曲，溶化，断层，缠绕，总体产生一种怪异的空间几何。法术区域的立方体之间不能相邻。当你施放该法术时处于某个立方体中的生物，以及在法术生效时进入区域之一的生物必须尝试一次意志豁免，这具有下列效果。与幻想交互的生物也会如常获得一次意志豁免来不相信幻觉。

成功 该生物不相信该幻觉。

失败 所有在立方体中的地形对该生物均为困难地形，如果该生物在飞行也包括空中，如果该生物在攀爬也包括墙壁，以此类推。当该生物将离开某个立方体是，它会从一个由GM决定的随机立方体出来。这是一个传送效果。它可以选择从这个立方体的任一边缘离开。当选择随机立方体时，GM应当排除任何和生物所处地形不对应的立方体；例如，如果生物沿着地面离开，GM应当排除任何不含地面出口的立方体。

Stumbling Curse.name: Stumbling Curse
Stumbling Curse.description:
With a twist of a finger, you send a creature careening on a haphazard trajectory. The target must attempt a Reflex save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes a –2 status penalty to Athletics and Acrobatics checks.

Failure As success, and each time the target Strides, it uses the first 5 feet of movement of the Stride to move 5 feet in a random direction (this is forced movement). This has no effect on a creature with only 5 feet of movement.

Critical Failure As failure, except you control the direction of the target's first 5 feet of movement of the Stride.

Subconscious Suggestion.name: 深层暗示 Subconscious Suggestion
Subconscious Suggestion.description:
你在目标的心智深处埋下潜意识的暗示，它们会在你指定的触发条件发生时遵照其行动。你向目标指示一系列动作。你的指示的用语对目标而言必须是一系列合理的动作，并且它不可以招致自毁或者明显违抗目标自身愿望。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响，并且知道你尝试控制它。

成功 目标不受影响，并且认为你在和它们正常对话，而不是对其施放法术。

失败 指示会保留在目标潜意识中，直到下一次你日常准备。如果触发条件在那之前发生，目标会立即按照你的指示行动。该效果的持续时间为1分钟，或者直到目标完成一个有终点的指示，或者直到指示变得会招致自毁，或具有其他明显的负面效果。

大失败 如同失败，但该持续时间为1小时。

升阶 (9环级) 你能以至多10个生物作为目标。

Sudden Blight.name: 瞬间枯萎 Sudden Blight
Sudden Blight.description:
你加速区域中的腐坏过程。在该区域中的每个生物承受 [[/r {2d10}[negative]]]{2d10 负能量伤害} （基础强韧豁免）。被疾病影响的生物在此次豁免上承受-2环境减值。你可以将该枯萎转为侵蚀区域中所有小型和超小型非生物植物，清除非魔法的下层植被，以及其造成的任何困难地形及隐蔽。瞬间枯萎会在令植物凋零前会尝试反制植物上的任何魔法效果。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d10。

Sudden Bolt.name: Sudden Bolt
Sudden Bolt.description:
You call down a small bolt of lightning on the target, dealing 4d12 electricity damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12.

Sudden Recollection.name: Sudden Recollection
Sudden Recollection.description:
You place a bit of knowledge deep in a creature's subconscious or make a willing creature forget some information until a specific trigger occurs. The target gets a Will saving throw to resist the effect. A willing creature can choose to fail its save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and realizes you tried to alter its memory.

Success The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of sudden recollection, unless it identifies the spell.

Failure You choose a piece of information the target didn't already know and create a trigger, such as seeing an object, hearing a key phrase, or witnessing an event. As soon as the target experiences the trigger, it receives the information and the spell ends. If the target was willing, you can instead choose a piece of information the target already knew and suppress its memory of that information until it experiences the trigger, after which it recovers the information and the spell ends.

Sudden Shift.name: 瞬息换位 Sudden Shift
Sudden Shift.description:
触发 一个敌人在对你的近战攻击中失手。

你从一个危险的地方快速移开并掩饰自身。你快步（Step）并且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

Suggestion.name: 暗示术 Suggestion
Suggestion.description:
你的甜言蜜语令生物难以抗拒。你向目标指示一系列动作，其用语对目标而言必须是一系列合理的动作，并且它不可以招致自毁或者明显违抗目标自身愿望。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响，并且知道你尝试控制它。

成功 目标不受影响，并且认为你在和它们正常对话，而不是对其施放法术。

失败 目标立即按照你的指示行动。该法术的持续时间为1分钟，或者直到目标完成一个有终点的指示，或者直到指示变得会招致自毁，或具有其他明显的负面效果。

大失败 如同失败，但基本持续时间为1小时。

升阶 (8环级) 你能以至多10个生物为目标。

Summon Anarch.name: Summon Anarch
Summon Anarch.description:
You conjure a chaotic celestial, monitor, or fiend to fight on your behalf. You summon a common chaotic creature that has the celestial, monitor, or fiend trait and whose level is 5 or lower. You can't summon a creature unless its alignment is one of your deity's preferred alignments (or, if you don't have a deity, is within one step of your alignment). At the GM's discretion, some deities might restrict specific types of creatures, even if their alignments match. Heightening the spell increases the maximum level of creature you can summon.

Heightened (6th) Level 7.

Heightened (7th) Level 9.

Heightened (8th) Level 11.

Heightened (9th) Level 13.

Heightened (10th) Level 15.

Summon Animal.name: 召唤动物 Summon Animal
Summon Animal.description:
你创造一个为你而战的动物。你召唤一个具有动物特征的常见生物，其等级为-1。升阶该法术会增加你能召唤的生物的最大等级。

升阶 (2环级) 等级 1

升阶 (3环级) 等级 2

升阶 (4环级) 等级 3

升阶 (5环级) 等级 5

升阶 (6环级) 等级 7

升阶 (7环级) 等级 9

升阶 (8环级) 等级 11

升阶 (9环级) 等级 13

升阶 (10环级) 等级 15

Summon Archmage.name: Summon Archmage
Summon Archmage.description:
You briefly call forth the spirit of a legendary wizard from ages long past, which manifests as an immense humanoid figure (typically an elf or a human). The archmage occupies the space of a Large creature and has a Speed of 60 feet.

Arrive (evocation, force) Archmage's Amplification The archmage arrives in a fierce burst of magical force, automatically dealing 3d4+3 force damage to up to 5 creatures it chooses within 100 feet of it. Like @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Magic Missiles}, this can be blocked by the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield} spell. The archmage also feeds magical power into some spells. Beneficial spells last longer due to the archmage's influence. When the remaining duration of a beneficial spell affecting you or one of your allies would decrease (usually at the start of the caster's turn), it doesn't decrease if the subject of the spell is within 100 feet of the archmage. This applies only if the spell's maximum duration was 3 rounds or longer.

Depart (abjuration) Archmage's Rebuke The archmage drains the magic from your foes. Each of your enemies within 100 feet of the archmage must attempt a Will save. On a failure, the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round, and if it's currently benefiting from any spells of a lower level than summon archmage, the archmage can choose any one of them and end the spell.

Summon Axiom.name: Summon Axiom
Summon Axiom.description:
You conjure a lawful celestial, monitor, or fiend to fight on your behalf. You summon a common lawful creature that has the celestial, monitor, or fiend trait and whose level is 5 or lower. You can't summon a creature unless its alignment is one of your deity's preferred alignments (or, if you don't have a deity, is within one step of your alignment). At the GM's discretion, some deities might restrict specific types of creatures, even if their alignments match. Heightening the spell increases the maximum level of creature you can summon.

Heightened (6th) Level 7.

Heightened (7th) Level 9.

Heightened (8th) Level 11.

Heightened (9th) Level 13.

Heightened (10th) Level 15.

Summon Celestial.name: 召唤天族 Summon Celestial
Summon Celestial.description:
你创造一个为你的阵营而战的天族（celestial）。这如同召唤动物（summon animal），但你会召唤一个具有天族（celestial）特征的常见生物，其等级为5或者更低。仅当召唤的生物的阵营是你的神祇偏好阵营时你才能召唤它（如果你没有神祇，则为你的阵营1阶以内）。根据GM的判断，部分神祇可能严格限定特定类型的天族（celestial），而不仅仅是阵营相符。

Summon Deific Herald.name: Summon Deific Herald
Summon Deific Herald.description:
Your faith is strong enough to briefly summon a direct representative of your deity, such as the deity's herald. The herald occupies the space of a Huge creature and has a Speed of 60 feet. The effects of this spell depend on your deity's alignment.

  • Lawful Good Arrive (enchantment, good, lawful) Aura of Retribution While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EAP98XaChJEbgKcK]{Retributive Strike} reaction; Depart Holy Smite The herald casts 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{Divine Wrath} (choosing good) in a 100-foot emanation.
  • Neutral Good Arrive (enchantment, good) Aura of Redemption While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tuZnRWHixLArvaIf]{Glimpse of Redemption} reaction; Depart Merciful Healing The herald casts the 3-action version of 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} with a radius of 100 feet. This spell targets only you and your allies.
  • Chaotic Good Arrive (chaotic, enchantment, good) Aura of Liberation While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.IX1VlVCL5sFTptEE]{Liberating Step} reaction; Depart Radiating Freedom The herald affects you and all your allies within 100 feet with @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement}. The duration is reduced to 3 rounds.
  • Lawful Neutral Arrive (abjuration, lawful) Defy Chaos You and each ally within 100 feet of the herald gain resistance 20 against chaotic damage while the herald is present; Depart Order's Wrath The herald casts 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{Divine Wrath} (choosing lawful) in a 100-foot emanation
  • Neutral Arrive (transmutation) Quickening Ripple You and each ally within 100 feet of the herald are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} while the herald is present, and can use the additional action to Step, Stride, or Strike; Depart Sapping Beam The herald casts 6th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.eexkxcqnkXazsGfK]{Enervation} in a 100‑foot line.
  • Chaotic Neutral Arrive (abjuration, chaotic) Defy Law You and each ally within 100 feet of the herald gain resistance 20 against lawful damage while the herald is present; Depart Chaos Hammer The herald casts 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{Divine Wrath} (choosing chaotic) in a 100-foot emanation.
  • Lawful Evil Arrive Aura of Iron While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.M8RCbthRhB4bxO9t]{Iron Command} reaction; Depart Unholy Blight The herald casts 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{Divine Wrath} (choosing evil) in a 100‑foot emanation.
  • Neutral Evil Arrive Aura of Selfishness While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.enQieRrITuEQZxx2]{Selfish Shield} reaction; Depart Infinite Despair The herald casts 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{Crushing Despair} in a 100-foot cone.
  • Chaotic Evil Arrive Aura of Vengeance While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.r5Uth6yvCoE4tr9z]{Destructive Vengeance} reaction; Depart Weapon Hurricane The herald casts 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8M03UxGXjYyDFAoy]{Weapon Storm} in a 100-foot cone, using d12 for the die size.

Summon Draconic Legion.name: Summon Draconic Legion
Summon Draconic Legion.description:
You momentarily summon an army of powerful dragons that unleash annihilating blasts as they descend upon your location. These dragons act as one and collectively occupy the space of a Gargantuan creature. They have a fly Speed of 100 feet. When you Cast this Spell, choose whether it summons chromatic or metallic dragons.

Arrive (evocation) Energy Annihilation The draconic legion breathes out two blasts of energy: a @Template[type:line|distance:120] and a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] that can't overlap. Each creature in either of the areas takes 10d8 damage (basic Reflex save). The dragons choose the damage type of each breath weapon, depending on the category of dragons summoned. Chromatic dragons can choose cold, fire, or poison for the cone and acid or electricity for the line; metallic dragons can choose cold or fire for the cone and acid, electricity, or fire for the line.

Depart Draconic Whirlwind The draconic legion strikes with fury, dealing [[/r {9d8}[slashing]]]{9d8 slashing damage} (basic Reflex save) to all enemy creatures in its location or within 20 feet.
