升阶 (5环级) 该乐器改为一件 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.3ld14dsn2RLu9owg]{专家级手持乐器 Musical Instrument (Virtuoso handheld)}

Summon Kaiju.name: Summon Kaiju
Summon Kaiju.description:
You briefly conjure a kaiju, a massive, rampaging monster with a unique name and legendary reputation. It rises from its secluded lair to annihilate your foes. The summoned kaiju occupies the space of a Gargantuan creature. When you Cast this Spell, choose one of the kaiju below to summon.

  • Agmazar the Star Titan Speed 100 feet, climb 50 feet; Arrive (necromancy, negative) Channel Void Each foe in a 100-foot emanation takes [[/r {16d8}[negative]]]{16d8 negative energy damage} with a basic Fortitude save; Depart (transmutation) Gravitic Repulsion Each foe in a 50-foot emanation is pushed 100 feet away unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save.
  • Agyra, the Forever Storm Speed 80 feet, fly 200 feet; Arrive (electricity, evocation) Breath of a Thousand Storms Agyra shoots two 1,200-foot lines of electricity, one from each of her heads. The lines can't overlap. Each creature along one of the lines takes [[/r {6d12}[electricity]]]{6d12 electricity damage} with a basic Reflex save. On a failure, the creature is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round (or for 1 minute on a critical failure); Depart (evocation, sonic) Thunderous Blast Each creature within a 100-foot emanation takes [[/r {6d10}[sonic]]]{6d10 sonic damage} with a basic Reflex save, and is also knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} on a failed save.
  • Bezravnis, the Inferno Below Speed 100 feet, burrow 100 feet; Arrive (earth, evocation) Burrow from the Earth's Heart Bezravnis explodes from the ground where it was summoned, causing all creatures in a 50-foot emanation to take [[/r {8d12}[bludgeoning]]]{8d12 bludgeoning damage} with a basic Reflex save. This potentially collapses structures with the collapse effect of the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu]{Earthquake} spell, except there is no chance of falling into a fissure; Depart Web Hurricane Bezravnis departs with a hurricane of webbing. All creatures within a 50-foot emanation must succeed at a Reflex save or take a -20-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it Escapes (or is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it escapes on a critical failure). The Escape DC is your spell DC.
  • Mogaru, the Final King Speed 100 feet, swim 100 feet; Arrive (auditory, enchantment, mental) Trance of the King's Melody Mogaru manifests with a burst of the song that summoned him, requiring all foes within 60 feet who can hear him to attempt a Will save, leaving them @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3} on a failure; Depart (evocation, fire) Volcanic Breath Mogaru unleashes his scorching breath in a 120-foot cone. Each creature in the area takes [[/r {10d6}[fire]]]{10d6 fire damage} with a basic Reflex save. On a failure, it also takes [[/r {4d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}.
  • Vorgozen, the Shapeless Feeder Speed 50 feet, climb 50 feet, swim 100 feet; Arrive (necromancy) Pollute Magic Vorgozen's foul presence pollutes magic around her. Each of your enemies within a 60-foot emanation that are under the effects of a spell must attempt a Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}. Any of your enemies that Casts a Spell within 60 feet of Vorgozen must attempt a Fortitude save with the same effects unless it's already sickened; Depart (acid, evocation) Beam of Purest Vitriol Each creature in a 1,200-foot line takes [[/r {10d6}[acid]]]{10d6 acid damage} and [[/r {10d6}[bludgeoning]]]{10d6 bludgeoning damage} with a basic Fortitude save.
  • Yarthoon, the Moon Grub Speed 60 feet, burrow 100 feet, fly 100 feet, swim 100 feet; Arrive (cold, evocation) Algid Beam Barrage Yarthoon fires countless beams, targeting each of your enemies within 200 feet of it. The beams deal [[/r {10d6}[cold]]]{10d6 cold damage} with a basic Reflex save; Depart (cold, conjuration, water) Frostbite Mist Chilling mist surges out in a 100‑foot burst centered on Yarthoon and remains for 1 minute. This mist has the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist}, plus any creature within the area at the end of its turn take [[/r {5d6}[cold]]]{5d6 cold damage} with a basic Fortitude save.
  • Ebeshra, the Winged Razor Speed 75 feet, fly 100 feet; Arrive (conjuration, teleportation) Planar Draw Each foe in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:100] is pulled 50 feet towards the center, unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save. Creatures that fail and reach the center take [[/r {10d6}[bludgeoning]]]{10d6 bludgeoning damage}; Depart (electricity, evocation) Storm Discharge Each foe in a @Template[type:line|distance:240] takes [[/r {12d8}[electricity]]]{12d8 electricity damage} with a basic Reflex save.

Summon Lesser Servitor.name: Summon Lesser Servitor
Summon Lesser Servitor.description:
While deities jealously guard their most powerful servants from the summoning spells of those who aren't steeped in the faith, this spell allows you to conjure an inhabitant of the Outer Sphere with or without the deity's permission.

You summon a celestial, monitor, or fiend whose level is –1 to fight on your behalf. Alternatively, you can choose a magical animal from the Outer Sphere as your lesser servitor. This animal is your choice of an @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.8r8Ar08ojdJuPeiH]{Eagle}, @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.QRRX82FIjBKd8pzs]{Guard Dog}, or @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.hFbfXmjMkGEzMkQ1]{Raven}. It gains the alignment matching your deity (or you, if you don't have a deity) and has the following trait depending on the alignment it gained: celestial for lawful, monitor for neutral, or fiend for evil. You can't summon a creature if it is opposed to your deity's alignment on either axis (or opposed to your alignment if you don't follow a deity). For example, if you deity is lawful good, you can't summon a chaotic or evil creature. The GM might determine that deities restrict specific types of creatures even if their alignments aren't diametrically opposed. For example, Pharasma would restrict the summoning of sahkils.

Heightening the spell increases the maximum level of creature you can summon and might add additional animal servitors, which otherwise work like the eagle, guard dog, and raven.

Heightened (2nd) Level 1.

Heightened (3rd) Level 2. You can summon a @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.xxP5FJotshmUQNtY]{Black Bear}, @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.C9s5tBxVValC2HTE]{Giant Bat}, or @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.wqPYzMNgYvrO6oEP]{Leopard}.

Heightened (4th) Level 3. You can summon a @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.WNiNj0Brn2LCYmwd]{Great White Shark} or @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.ypLkUfuHHfNDsVUQ]{Tiger}.

Summoner's Precaution.name: Summoner's Precaution
Summoner's Precaution.description: You create a buffer in the link between yourself and your eidolon in order to prevent you from falling alongside your bonded ally. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VCUz5EnBUJF07j1a]{Sever Conduit} reaction; after using it, the spell ends.

Summoner's Visage.name: Summoner's Visage
Summoner's Visage.description:
You transform your eidolon into your identical twin. Assuming you are a humanoid, the eidolon gains the humanoid trait in addition to its other traits while it's in this form, as well as any other trait related to your form (such as elf or gnome). Your eidolon gains a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate you and can add its level to such checks even if it's untrained.

Although your eidolon looks like you, it doesn't gain any new abilities, and its statistics don't change in any way-the transformation is purely cosmetic. If this transformation reduces your eidolon's size, the eidolon loses any other effects of its larger size, such as any increase to reach. Your eidolon can still use gear only if it has the eidolon trait, which allows eidolons to use it. Any such eidolon items the eidolon was wearing change size and shape, if necessary, and its effects remain active.

You can Dismiss the spell.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.0OC945wcZ4H4akLz]{Spell Effect: Summoner's Visage}

Heightened (4th) The duration increases to 1 hour.

Sun Blade.name: Sun Blade
Sun Blade.description:
You fire a ray of burning sunlight from your weapon. You must be wielding a sword or spear to cast sun blade, and you perform this spell's somatic component with the weapon. Make a spell attack roll. The ray deals 1d4 fire damage. If the target is evil, the ray deals an additional 1d4 good damage, and if the target is undead, the ray deals an additional 1d4 positive damage (both effects apply against creatures that are both evil and undead). If you are in an area of bright natural sunlight, increase the die size of each damage die by one step (from d4 to d6).

Critical Success The ray deals double damage.

Success The ray deals full damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4 fire, 1d4 good, and 1d4 positive (or 1d6 of each type of damage in bright natural sunlight).

Sun's Fury.name: Sun's Fury
Sun's Fury.description: The target weapon becomes wreathed in a glowing flame. The weapon deals an additional [[/r {1d4}[fire]]]{1d4 fire damage} and [[/r {1}[good]]]{1 good damage} on a successful Strike. In addition, the flame causes the weapon to glow as bright as a torch. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell.

Sunburst.name: 阳炎爆 Sunburst
Sunburst.description:
强力而耀眼的球状日光在区域中爆开，对该区域中的生物造成8d10火焰伤害，以及对不死生物造成8d10额外正能量伤害。在该区域中的每个生物和物体必须尝试一次反射豁免。如果阳炎爆的球状区域与魔法黑暗的区域部分重叠，则会尝试反制该黑暗效果。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物承受一半伤害。

失败 该生物承受完整伤害。

大失败 该生物承受完整伤害，并且永久 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲} 。

升阶 (+1) 该火焰伤害增加1d10，并且对不死生物的正能量伤害增加1d10。

Swamp of Sloth.name: 怠惰沼泽 Swamp of Sloth
Swamp of Sloth.description:
范围内的土地变得腐臭而湿软。该范围成为困难地形。泥沼底部的污泥变为了拥有恶魔外观的微型污泥野兽。它们并不像普通生物那般活动，而是会淹没沼泽中的生物并且散发出有毒的恶臭。沼泽造成1d6毒素伤害；在该区域内结束其回合的生物必须尝试一次基础强韧豁免。你可以在施放法术的时候增加动作的数量。每个额外的动作可以使爆发半径增加5尺。

升阶 (+2) 伤害增加1d6点，初始爆发半径增加5尺。

Swampcall.name: Swampcall
Swampcall.description:
You call upon the spirits of the soil to twist and churn, transforming the terrain in the targeted area into a sodden mess. The area becomes difficult terrain. Creatures in the area when you Cast this Spell must attempt a Reflex saving throw.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature sinks partially into the mud. The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds (except for its swim Speed, if any) and becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}. These effects last until the creature leaves the area or until the end of its next turn, whichever comes first.

Critical Failure As failure, but the penalty to Speeds (except Swim speed) is -15 feet.

Heightened (3rd) The range increases to 60 feet, and the area increases to a 20-foot burst.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.ROuGwXEvFznzGE9k]{Spell Effect: Swampcall (Failure)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.otK6eG3b3FV7n2xP]{Spell Effect: Swampcall (Critical Failure)}

Swarm Form.name: Swarm Form
Swarm Form.description:
You discorporate into a swarm of Tiny creatures. While in swarm form, you have the swarm trait and you gain resistance 5 to slashing and piercing damage and weakness 5 to area and splash damage. You can fit into spaces only a few inches wide, moving your constituent creatures through the gap. You don't gain the swarm mind ability, so you are still affected normally by mental effects. As a swarm, you can't speak, cast spells, use manipulate actions requiring your hands, activate your magic items, or make any of your Strikes with your normal body. You can Dismiss the Spell.

Heightened (+2) Increase your resistances and weaknesses each by 5.

Swarming Wasp Stings.name: Swarming Wasp Stings
Swarming Wasp Stings.description:
You manifest a swarm of disembodied wasp stingers that stab creatures in the area, possibly poisoning them. Creatures in the affected area take [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage}. Each creature that takes piercing damage must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 poison damage}.

Failure The target is afflicted with Swarming Wasp Venom at stage 1.

Critical Failure The target is afflicted with swarming wasp venom at stage 2.

Swarming Wasp Venom (poison)

Level 7

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {3d6}[poison]]]{3d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 round)

Swarmsense.name: Swarmsense
Swarmsense.description:
You extend your senses through a multitude of crawling and flying creatures. You create a crawling swarm in your square. You can hear through the swarm as if using your normal auditory senses. The first time you Sustain the Spell each round, you can move the swarm 10 feet along the ground in any direction. The swarm has AC 15 and a +0 bonus to its saves. Any damage dealt to the swarm destroys it and ends the spell.

Heightened (3rd) The swarm has the benefits of spider climb.

Heightened (5th) The swarm has a fly Speed of 10 feet. You can see through the swarm using your visual senses.

Heightened (7th) The swarm gains a 10-foot status bonus to its Speeds.

Sweet Dream.name: 甜蜜美梦 Sweet Dream
Sweet Dream.description:
通过安心的歌曲或者故事，你使目标目标放松，沉入迷人的美梦。当你施放该法术时，如果目标尚未失去意识，则目标 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}。当失去意识时，它会经历你选择的梦境。

若他睡眠了至少1分钟，在法术剩余的时间中，它会获得梦境的效果。

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.v051JKN0Dj3ve5cF]{洞察之梦 Dream of Insight} 在基于智力的技能检定上获得+1状态加值
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.MJSoRFfEdM4j5mNG]{浪漫之梦 Dream of Glamour} 在基于魅力的技能检定上获得+1状态加值
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.sE2txm68yZSFMV3v]{远航之梦 Dream of Voyaging} 在速度上获得+5尺状态加值

如果你再次施放该法术，任何之前你施放的甜蜜美梦会结束。

Symphony of the Unfettered Heart.name: 自由之心交响曲 Symphony of the Unfettered Heart
Symphony of the Unfettered Heart.description:
你的交响曲将听众从世俗的烦恼中解脱出来。尝试1次表演检定来反制（counteract）正在影响目标的后述状态之一： @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed}, 或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned}。若你的检定失败，则在1日内无法再次以该生物身上的对应效果为目标。使用状态的来源来判断反制DC（举例说明：擒抱则为 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} DC）。

升阶 (9环级) 你能将至多以4个生物作为法术目标。

Synaptic Pulse.name: 神经脉冲 Synaptic Pulse
Synaptic Pulse.description:
你释放出爆发的精神脉冲，穿透区域中每个敌人的精神。每个该区域中的生物必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

失败 该生物获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}。

大失败 该生物震慑，持续1轮。

Synchronize.name: Synchronize
Synchronize.description:
You harmlessly place your unique magic sigil, which is about 1 square inch in size, on your targets. When you Cast the Spell, you set the duration by choosing a time at which point the sigil flashes dimly three times. After that point, the spell ends. Even though spell durations aren't normally exact, the effects of synchronize are precise to the second. The timer is based on the place where the spell was cast, so entering a plane or area where time flows differently changes how the time elapses.

Heightened (2nd) The spell can target up to 20 willing creatures.

Synesthesia.name: 通感超载 Synesthesia
Synesthesia.description:
目标的感官被胡乱地重新连接，它将噪音认知为弥漫的色彩，将气味认知为声音，如是种种。这具有三种效果，目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。由于这种干扰，每次目标使用具有专注特征的行动时，必须成功通过DC5纯骰检定，否则动作失败并被浪费。 目标难以处理视觉信息，令所有生物和物体对其为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。该生物移动困难，令其获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 3}，并且令其在速度上获得-10尺状态减值。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标受到影响1轮。

失败 目标受到影响1分钟。

大失败 如同失败，并且目标为了处理混乱的感官信息获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2} 。

升阶 (9环级) 你能以至多五个生物为目标。

Take its Course.name: 自然发作 Take its Course
Take its Course.description:
当某人暴食纵欲后，你可以令其快速度过这苦难，或者增加其痛苦。该法术会尝试推进疾病苦难，毒素苦难，或者影响目标的持续毒素伤害。如果目标被多于一种这类效果影响，你从这些效果中选择你所知晓的一个；否则由GM随机选择。非自愿目标可以尝试一次意志豁免来取消 自然发作 Take its Course。

该法术的效果根据你是否想结束一项苦难或者持续毒素伤害，以及你想帮助还是阻碍目标的回复而有所改变。

  • 苦难 Affliction 目标立即尝试其下一次对抗该苦难的豁免。你可以根据你的选择，赋予该生物在这次对抗该苦难的豁免骰上 @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.nHXKK4pRXAzrLdEP]{+2 状态加值} 或者 @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.R27azQfzeFuFc48G]{-2 状态减值} 。
  • 持续毒素 Persistent Poison 你可以令目在你施放该法术时立即承受该持续毒素伤害（额外承受在其每回合结束时的伤害）。无论你是否如此做，目标尝试一次纯骰检定，对抗该持续毒素伤害。你可以设定裸骰的DC为5或者20，而不是通常的DC。

升阶 (7环级) 你可以尝试推进任意数量的目标上生效的苦难和持续毒素伤害。

Talking Corpse.name: 死者交谈 Talking Corpse
Talking Corpse.description:
你赋予目标尸体生命的要素，令其能够回答三个你向它提出的问题。该法术会唤起身躯的潜在记忆，而不是唤回目标已经死去的灵魂，所以该法术需要该尸体基本完好才能运作。尸体受到的损伤越多，其回答的笼统与拼凑程度也就越大，并且它必须要有嘴和喉咙才有可能说话。如果任何人在一周内已经对该尸体施放了该法术，该法术会自动失败。该尸体可以尝试一次意志豁免来抵抗回答该问题，使用其原本生物在死亡时的数据，并且有下列效果。

大成功 目标可以撒谎或者拒绝回答你的问题，并且该目标的灵魂会对你作祟24小时，不断干扰你，令你在此期间无法获得任何休息。

成功 目标可以提供错误的信息，或者拒绝回答你的问题。

失败 目标必须如实回答问题，但它的回答可以是简短的，谜语般的，重复的。它仍然可以误导你，或者尝试拖延时间，以令在你问完所有问题之前法术持续时间耗尽。

大失败 如同失败，但是目标的答案会更加直接，很少重复，但仍然如同谜语。在它欺骗和误导你的欺骗（Deception）检定上承受-2状态减值。

Tame.name: 驯服术 Tame
Tame.description:
你发出舒适的声音，作出温柔的手势，细心而自信，你以友好的方式逐渐接近该目标。在法术持续时间中，除非目标成功通过一次意志豁免，你改善它对你的态度一级（不友善到不关心，不关心到友善，友善到乐于帮助）。之后，该目标暂时免疫1天。

该法术只对驯养的动物有效；例如，你可以对看门犬或流浪犬使用该法术，但对野生犬或者狼不能使用。如果该动物的社会性存在疑问，则由GM做出判断。

升阶 (3环级) 该持续时间变为10分钟。

升阶 (6环级) 该持续时间变为1小时。

Tanglefoot.name: 绊足术 Tanglefoot
Tanglefoot.description:
一条布满粘液的藤蔓在空中出现，它从你的手中弹出，抽向目标。对目标尝试一次法术攻击骰。

大成功 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} 状态，并且在其速度上获得-10尺环境减值，持续1轮。它能尝试对抗你的法术DC以逃脱（Escape），来移除减值和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} 状态。

成功 目标在速度上承受-10尺环境减值，持续1轮。它能尝试对抗你的法术DC以逃脱（Escape），来移除减值。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.TwtUIEyenrtAbeiX]{法术效果：绊足术}

失败 目标不受影响。

升阶 (2环级) 该效果持续2轮。

升阶 (4环级) 该效果持续1分钟。

Tangling Creepers.name: 缠结匐蔓 Tangling Creepers
Tangling Creepers.description: 茂密缠绕的蔓生植物从区域中所有表面中冒出，并充实每一块水体。。在该区域中的，在地面上移动的，在藤蔓上攀爬或者游泳的生物，在其速度上承受-10尺环境减值。每轮一次，你可以使用一个具有专注特征的单动作，令藤蔓从任何方格涌出。该藤蔓具有15尺触及。对目标尝试一次法术攻击骰；如果成功，该藤蔓会将目标拽入蔓生植物中，令其 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} ，持续1轮，或者直到该生物逃脱（Escape）（对抗你的法术DC），以先发生为准。

Tattoo Whispers.name: Tattoo Whispers
Tattoo Whispers.description:
You carefully tattoo the same design upon each secondary caster. The tattoo can be of any shape or symbol, but it must include a mouth. The tattoo fades naturally over the course of 1 month.

Critical Success The tattoos on the secondary casters are all magically linked for 1 week, providing a semi-telepathic bond. Each secondary caster can communicate secretly with any other secondary casters at any time by mouthing words but making no sound. The person receiving a message must be within 120 feet of the sender, must be within the sender's line of sight, and must have their tattoo uncovered. The mouth of the tattoo moves to match the words, which the tattoo whispers, but only the tattoo's bearer can hear it.

Success As critical success, but the effect lasts for 1 day.

Failure The ritual has no effect.

Critical Failure The ritual has no effect and creates a backlash of persistent mental static. All casters are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 day.

Telekinetic Haul.name: 念动移物 Telekinetic Haul
Telekinetic Haul.description: 你移动目标至多20尺，可能令其停留在半空。当你维持该法术时，你可以再次如此做，或者你可以选择移动另一个可行的目标。

Telekinetic Maneuver.name: 念动战技 Telekinetic Maneuver
Telekinetic Maneuver.description: 你通过一股猛烈的念动力移动一个敌人或者其携带的事物。你可以对目标尝试卸武（Disarm），推撞（Shove），或者摔绊（Trip），使用法术攻击骰，而不是运动（Athletics）检定；

Telekinetic Projectile.name: 念动射弹 Telekinetic Projectile
Telekinetic Projectile.description:
你向目标射出区域中一个未固定的，无主的，1负载1以下的物体。对目标尝试一次法术攻击骰。如果你命中，你造成钝击，穿刺，或者挥砍伤害（对应于你所扔出的物体），数值等于1d6加上你的施法属性调整值。射出物体的特殊特征或者魔法特性不会影响该攻击或者伤害。

大成功 你造成双倍伤害。

成功 你造成完整伤害。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d6。

Telepathic Bond.name: 心灵连线 Telepathic Bond
Telepathic Bond.description: 这些目标能和任意或者全部在同一星球上的其他法术目标通过心灵感应交流。

Telepathic Demand.name: 心灵暗示 Telepathic Demand
Telepathic Demand.description: 你向目标发送一段25词或者更短的信息，并且它能够立即回复一段由他所编纂的25词或者更短的信息。你的信息十分阴险，具有 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{暗示术 Suggestion}的效果，该信息内容会代替为口头的指示。当豁免成功时，目标会暂时免疫1天，并且在大成功时，目标会暂时免疫1个月。仅有你曾经通过心灵感应接触的生物可以作为目标，例如通过心灵感应法术。

Telepathy.name: 心灵感应 Telepathy
Telepathy.description:
你可以与30尺内的生物通过心灵感应交流。当你和一个生物交流并建立连接时，该交流是双向的。你只能和与你有相同语言的生物交流。

升阶 (6环级) 心灵感应失去语言特征。即使你们没有相同的语言，你也可以使用共通的心灵影响和其他生物交流。

Teleport.name: 传送术 Teleport
Teleport.description:
你和目标会立即传送到射程内的任何位置，只要你能通过该地点到你起始地点的相对位置，以及其外观（或者典型特征）来精确定位该地点。关于该地点外观的错误的知识会令法术失败，但它也可能导致传送到非预想地点或者造成其他由GM决定的事故。传送术在距离很远时无法保证精确。目标会在距离目标地大约总旅行距离1%的地方出现，其偏移方向由GM决定。对于短途旅行，这种误差可以忽略，但是对于长距旅行这可能达到1英里。

升阶 (7环级) 你和其他目标可以传送到1000英里内的任何地点。

升阶 (8环级) 你和其他目标可以传送到同一星球上的任何地点。如果你旅行超过1000英里，你只会偏移目标10英里。

升阶 (9环级) 你和其他目标可以传送到同一行星系中任何其他行星上的任意地点。若你对该地点的位置和外观有准确的知识，你会到达该星球上偏移目标100英里的位置。

升阶 (10环级) 如9环级版本，但是你和其他目标可以旅行到同一恒星系中的任何行星上。

Teleportation Circle.name: 传送法阵 Teleportation Circle
Teleportation Circle.description:
你在地面创造一个直径10尺的法阵，这个法阵会充当通往目的地（在仪式中指定）的入口。你会在仪式中以仪式的一部分来指定目的地。该目的地无法变更。目的地必须位于距离法阵的1000英里范围内，且与法阵处于相同的位面。你必须能够精确地识别目的地与创造法阵的位置之间的相对位置，而且能够通过外观（或者其他可识别的特征）来精确识别目的地。目的地也是一个直径10尺的法阵，它不能与任何实心建筑重叠，也不能是有害或有危险的地方。

为仪式尝试的生存检定的次要施法者能够直接身处目的地所在的确切地点，而非与你同处于起始法阵。若次要施法者在目的地的检定成功，而且你的检定也成功了，则该仪式会被视为大成功作为替代。

当法阵处于激活状态时，任何完全进入法阵的生物都会被立即传送至目的地。不愿被传送的生物能尝试意志豁免来抵抗该效果。若它停留在法阵内，则该生物必须在自己的每个回合结束时再次尝试上述豁免。

传送法阵通常时单向的，不过你可以通过把仪式的开销翻倍来使得传送法阵变为双向的。

大成功 你成功创造了传送法阵，无论传送距离多远，它都能十分精确地抵达。通过法阵的旅行者能准确地抵达指定地点。

成功 同大成功，但是传送法阵的目的地稍有偏差，目的地偏离目标的距离大约为传送总距离的1%，最远偏离距离为10英里。

失败 传送法阵无法生效。

大失败 传送法阵错得离谱。它会把人从起始点向着随机方向传送，传送距离与原本的距离相同，而且如此传送发生其他非常见事故的概率也会更高。

升阶 (9环级) 开销增加至2000gp，持续时间增加至1个月，目的地可以是同星球（same planet）上的任意位置。

升阶 (10环级) 开销增加至10000gp，持续时间变为无限，目的地可以是同星球（same planet）上的任意位置。

Tempest Form.name: 风暴形态 Tempest Form
Tempest Form.description:
你的躯体化为流体，更易于改变周遭事物。

当你施放该法术时，选择气、水或雾。选择气和雾时法术获得气特征，选择水和雾时法术获得水特征。

你的身体和衣甲变为无定型体。你失去所有AC上的物品加值，使用无武装防御的熟练加值来决定AC。你获得10点物理伤害抗力，免疫精准伤害。你可以穿过细小的裂缝，也无需呼吸。你无法施放法术、启动物品、使用具有攻击或操作特征的动作。根据所选形态，你获得下列效果。

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.b5OyBdc0bolgWZZT]{气 Air}
    • 你获得20尺飞行速度，飞行时变为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}。
    • 。你可用2动作行动以自己所在空间为起点发动 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{造风术 Gust of Wind} 效果，该行动拥有操作特征。
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.HDKJAUXMbtxnBdgR]{雾 Mist}
    • 你获得20尺飞行速度，躯体变为难以看穿的雾气。
    • 任何从你一方向你另一方瞄准的生物都会视另一方生物为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 状态。
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.C3RdbEQTvawqKAhw]{水 Water}
    • 你获得20尺游泳速度，在水中时变为隐形。
    • 你可用1个动作为自己冲入电能，这个动作拥有操作特征。若如此做，在水中时你会因迸发电能而不再隐形，但任何对你进行近战攻击的生物会受到 [[/r {1d6}[electricity]]]{1d6 电击伤害}；触碰你的生物会同时受到高阶诅咒的伤害和该效果的伤害。

升阶 (+2) 增加抗力5点和充能水形态的电击伤害1点。

Tempest Surge.name: 风暴浪涌 Tempest Surge
Tempest Surge.description:
你用翻卷着乌云、夹带着强风且闪电轰鸣的风暴将1个敌人包围其中。风暴造成1d12点电击伤害。目标必须尝试1次基础反射豁免（basic Reflex save）。失败时，目标还会获得持续1轮的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} 以及 [[/r {1}[persistent,electricity]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续电击伤害}。

升阶 (+1) 初始伤害（initial damage）增加1d12，且豁免失败造成的持续电击伤害增加1点。

Tempest Touch.name: 风暴之触 Tempest Touch
Tempest Touch.description:
你的触碰制造出一团冰水附着到目标身上，造成1d4点钝击伤害和1d4点寒冷伤害。目标必须进行强韧豁免检定。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标所受伤害减半，直到你的下回合结束时速度受到-5环境减值。

失败 目标受到完整伤害，直到你的下回合结束时速度受到-10环境减值。

大失败 如同失败，不过目标受到双倍伤害。

升阶 (+1) 钝击伤害和寒冷伤害同时增加1d4点。

Tempest of Shades.name: Tempest of Shades
Tempest of Shades.description:
You channel the forces of undeath to briefly call forth an amalgam of the vengeful dead slain by your enemies and allies alike. This amalgam manifests as a large tornado of insubstantial, howling faces. It occupies the space of a Huge creature and has a Speed of 60 feet.

Arrive (negative) Vortex of Death Each enemy creature within a 60-foot emanation must attempt a Fortitude save with the following effects.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3}.

Depart (emotion, fear, mental) Howl of Eternity The vengeful dead lets out an anguished scream. All your enemies within a 100-foot emanation must attempt Will saves with the following effects.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.

Critical Failure The creature is frightened 3. It's also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round or until it's no longer frightened, whichever comes first.

Temporal Ward.name: Temporal Ward
Temporal Ward.description:
You ward a target doorway or container with a temporal trap that rewinds the personal timeline of creatures trying to open it. A creature attempting to open a warded doorway or container must attempt a Will save with the below results.

You can set a password for the ward. Any creature that attempts to open the target container, or to open or pass through the target doorway without speaking the password must attempt a save as normal.

The ward vanishes automatically once the spell's duration ends, but can be removed before then as if it were a magical trap, using your spell DC for both the Perception check to notice it and Thievery check to disable it. Both checks require the creature attempting them to have expert proficiency in order to succeed.

You can Dismiss temporal ward. The maximum number of temporal wards you can have active at a time is equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

CriticalSuccess The creature is unaffected and opens the doorway or the container as normal.

Success The creature experiences a brief moment of déjà-vu in which they're convinced they already opened the door. They must use an additional action to open the door. If they can't or don't want to do so, the action or activity they used to open the door or container is wasted, and the door or container remains closed.

Failure The creature is thrown briefly backwards in time. The action or activity they used to open the door or container is wasted and they're returned to the position they were located at during the start of their turn. Their turn then ends.

Critical Failure As failure, but the temporal displacement also causes the creature to lose their bearings, making them @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 minute.

Heightened (10th) The temporal ward has an unlimited duration, until it is counteracted, Dismissed, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarmed}

Temporary Glyph.name: Temporary Glyph
Temporary Glyph.description:
Area 5-foot square

You temporarily bind a hostile spell into a symbol. While Casting this Spell, you also Cast a Spell of a lower spell level to store in the glyph. The stored spell must take 2 actions or fewer to Cast, have a hostile effect, and target one creature or have an area. Any creature that enters temporary glyph's area activates the glyph, releasing the harmful spell within. You can set a password for the glyph. Speaking it when entering the spell's area prevents the glyph from triggering. You can also set a more specific trigger to limit which types of creatures set off the glyph.

Once a spell is stored in the glyph, the glyph gains all the traits of that spell. If the stored spell can target one or more creatures, it targets the creature that set off the glyph. If it has an area, that area is centered on the creature that set off the glyph. Temporary glyph's duration ends when the glyph is triggered. The glyph is a magical trap, using your spell DC for both the Perception check to notice it and the Thievery check to disable it; both checks require the creature attempting them to be trained in order to succeed.

You can Dismiss temporary glyph.

Temporary Tool.name: Temporary Tool
Temporary Tool.description: You conjure a temporary simple tool, such as a shovel or rope into your hands. It lasts until it is used for a single activity or for 1 minute, whichever comes first, after which it disappears. The tool is obviously temporarily conjured, and thus can't be sold or passed off as a genuine item.

Tempt Fate.name: 挑战命运 Tempt Fate
Tempt Fate.description:
触发 你或者一个射程内的盟友尝试一次豁免骰。

你扭曲命运的力量，令某个时刻要么卓越非凡要么糟糕透顶，不留中间余地。

该目标在触发豁免骰上获得+1状态加值。如果该豁免骰结果为成功，它变为大成功。如果是失败，它变为大失败，并且该大失败不会由于任何通常会减弱大失败的效果所减弱，例如精通反射闪避（improved evasion）。

如果该触发能力没有同时具有大成功和大失败状态，挑战命运失败，并且你施放该法术时没有花费聚能点来。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.AJkRUIdYLnt4QOOg]{法术效果：挑战命运}

升阶 (8环级) 该对豁免骰的加值提升到+2。

Tentacular Limbs.name: 触手肢体 Tentacular Limbs
Tentacular Limbs.description:
你的手臂变为又长又软的触手，在你传递距离为接触的法术或是使用手臂进行无武装打击（Strikes）时（诸如拳头或爪抓打击），你的触及范围增加至10尺。这并不会改变你近战武器攻击的触及范围。在法术持续时间内，每当你施放法术时，你能够在额外添加一个动作使得你用于传递法术的触及范围临时增加至20尺。

升阶 (+2) 当你在施放法术中额外添加一个动作时，用于传递法术的触及范围的临时距离再增加10尺。

Terminate Bloodline.name: Terminate Bloodline
Terminate Bloodline.description:
Mighty drow noble houses, including House Shraen, use this ritual to stamp out fledgling noble houses before they rise to power. At the ritual's completion, you place a contagious wasting disease upon the target creature with the intention of ending their familial bloodline.

The ritual is easiest to cast on a subdued target, typically a low-ranking member of the targeted family bloodline who is kidnapped and has their memory wiped. If the target is conscious when the ritual is cast, the target attempts a Fortitude save against the ritual's DC; on a success, the ritual fails. Otherwise, the target is automatically affected by the dying bloodline disease.

Dying Bloodline (curse, disease) Failing or critically failing this disease's Fortitude save causes the disease to progress to the next stage as normal; however, succeeding or critically succeeding at the save has no effect. The disease can be removed only by first successfully counteracting the curse and then counteracting the disease

Level equal to twice the ritual's level

Stage 1 carrier with no effect (1 month)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} (1 week)

Stage 3 fatigued and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Stage 4 fatigued and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} (1 day)

Stage 5 death.

Every member of an infected creature's immediate family (blood relationship or parent or child) that comes into physical contact with that infected creature must attempt a Fortitude save or contract the disease.

Critical Success The creature does not contract the disease and does not need to attempt further saves when coming into physical contact with that particular creature (the creature is not immune to the disease, however, and must attempt a save as normal if it comes into physical contact with a different infected family member).

Success The creature is not affected but must attempt another save the next time they come into physical contact with that particular infected creature.

Failure The creature contracts the disease and can spread it in the same way as the original target.

Terrain Transposition.name: 地域传送 Terrain Transposition
Terrain Transposition.description: 你用魔力将自身所在位置与另一个地点进行调换。当你处于野外环境（wilderness environment）时，你可以将自身以及随身持有（holding）的物品传送至法术范围内你可以看到的无主空间（clear space）。若你具有 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{偏好地形 Favored Terrain} 且传送的起点和终点都在偏好地形内，则法术范围增加至180尺。若你有动物伙伴，且它与你相邻，那么你可以把它也一同传送到相邻的开放空间内；但如果要使用该法术携带任何其他生物与你一同传送，即便该生物被装入到跨次元容器内，本法术也会无效耗散。

Tether.name: Tether
Tether.description:
You use magical chains, vines, or other tethers to bind your target to you. The creature can still try to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} and it or others can break the tethers by attacking them (the tethers have AC 15 and 10 Hit Points). You must stay within 30 feet of the target while it is tethered; moving more than 30 feet away from your target ends the spell. The target must attempt a Reflex save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes a -5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed as long as it is within 30 feet of you.

Failure The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed and cannot move more than 30 feet away from you until it Escapes or the spell ends.

Critical Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it Escapes or the spell ends.

Heightened (+1) The tethers' AC increases by 3 and their Hit Points increase by 10.

The World's a Stage.name: The World's a Stage
The World's a Stage.description:
This famous ritual is a sophisticated example of symbolic magic, binding fate and fortune to follow a prepared script. To conduct the ritual, you and the secondary casters must put on a long-form, multi-person, plot-based performance that's usually a play or opera, though more unusual performances have been known. You take the role of the director, while the secondary casters are either actors (Performance) or significant backstage figures, such as set or costume designers (Crafting). The casting time of the ritual includes both preparations and rehearsals of various sorts and the actual performance, which must be at least an hour long.

The performance presents current events and offers a particular vision on how they resolve, often in metaphorical or allegorical format (proposing the overthrow of a tyrant by referring to a different, legendary tyrant who was overthrown, or suggesting that a murderous secret might be uncovered by presenting an allegory of truth defeating murder). This performance must be presented to an audience of at least a hundred people, a majority of whom must both be connected, at least peripherally, to the events in question (the people of the tyrant's city, or the residents of the village where the murder occurred) and who must understand what the metaphor or allegory actually refers to. For the magic to spark, the performance must declare its purpose loudly and clearly to the parties most concerned. If a major antagonist featured in the performance is in the audience and the ritual is a success, you get a critical success instead.

Critical Success Something sublime sparks between performance and audience, and destiny conspires to push events in the right direction. You and each secondary caster can reroll up to three skill checks at any point during the duration of the ritual after determining the results, as long as the skill check is connected to ensuring the topic of the performance comes true (to sneak past the tyrant's guards or find the murder weapon, for instance).

Success As critical success except the sparks of destiny are weaker, so each caster can reroll only a single skill check.

Failure The ritual has no effect.

Critical Failure The performance is a dramatic and horrendous botch, and fate strikes out at the casters. You and each secondary caster are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} for the next month, and this condition can't be removed by anything less than a wish or similarly powerful magic.

Thicket of Knives.name: Thicket of Knives
Thicket of Knives.description:
You create numerous phantom copies of your weapon arm, hiding your true movements and rendering your attacks unpredictable. You gain a +2 status bonus to Deception checks. If you're untrained in Deception, you can use the Feint action anyway, and add your level as your proficiency bonus despite being untrained.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.8ecGfjmxnBY3WWao]{Spell Effect: Thicket of Knives}

Thoughtful Gift.name: 心念馈赠 Thoughtful Gift
Thoughtful Gift.description:
你将一个手握的负载为轻或者可忽略的物体传送到目标处。如果目标有自由手，该物体立即在目标的手中出现，否则在其脚边出现。目标直到你尝试送过去的物体为何。如果目标 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}，或者拒绝接受你的赠予，或者法术会传送一个生物（即使该生物在一个异次元容器中），该法术结束。

升阶 (3环级) 法术的射程增加到500尺。

升阶 (5环级) 如同3环级，但是该物体的最大负载增加到1。你可以通过3个动作而非1个动作来 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放该法术Cast the Spell}；如此做射程会增加到1英里，并且你与目标间无需视觉线，但你必须和目标非常熟悉。

Threefold Aspect.name: 三相 Threefold Aspect
Threefold Aspect.description:
此法术令你能够在自身的三个不同年龄状态中转换：少女（青年），母亲（成年），老妪（老年）。在 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放该法术 Cast the Spell}时选择其中之一。在法术持续时间内，你可以通过一个具有专注特征的单动作，改变到三个年龄状态中任一或者你正常的年龄状态。你的外形无论年龄如何看起来总是像你，认识你的生物仍然能认出你，并且可以发现你的年龄不一样了。

三相 改变你的物理外观和性格，以展现你不同年龄中的逼真形象。这会令你在假装成选择的年龄的欺骗（Deception）上获得+4状态加值，并且即使你未受训，也能将等级作为熟练加值加到这些检定上。除此之外，除非一个生物专门使用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek} 动作，或者用其他方式仔细检查你，它无法进一步了解你不处于你的真实年龄。你可以 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{解消 Dismiss} 该法术。

Thunderburst.name: 轰天雷 Thunderburst
Thunderburst.description:
你发出强力的雷与气的爆炸，造成2d6点钝击伤害和2d6点音波伤害。范围内所有生物进行强韧豁免检定。

大成功 目标不受影响。.

成功 目标受到一半伤害。

失败 目标受到全额伤害且 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}1分钟。

大失败 目标受到双倍伤害且耳聋1小时。

升阶 (+2) 每种类型伤害都增加2d6点，范围增加5尺。

Thundering Dominance.name: Thundering Dominance
Thundering Dominance.description:
You shroud the target in a powerful predatory aura and amplify its vocalizations. It gains a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks. Once during this spell's duration, it can take the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.6SAdjml3OZw0BZnn]{Thundering Roar} action.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.81TfqzTfIqkQA4Dy]{Spell Effect: Thundering Dominance}

Heightened (+2) The status bonus to Intimidation checks increases by 1 (to a maximum of a +4 status bonus for an 8th-level spell), and the damage from the roar increases by 2d8.

Thunderous Strike.name: 雷鸣打击 Thunderous Strike
Thunderous Strike.description:
你挥舞你的重型武器，发出一阵音波震动以掀倒所有生物。用你的双手武器进行一次近战打击。以你为起点的15尺锥形（cone）区域内每个生物必须进行一次基础强韧检定（basic Fortitude save）以对抗你的法术DC否则承受2点音波伤害。如果大失败，目标生物被 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{击倒}。你打击的目标必须在锥形区内否则法术效果失效。

升阶 (+1) 伤害增加1点。

Note: Conflux spells refresh Spellstrike.

Tidal Surge.name: 潮汐涌流 Tidal Surge
Tidal Surge.description:
你唤动猛烈的波浪，推动在水体中或者在地面上的目标。目标必须尝试一次强韧豁免。

失败 你沿地面向任意方向移动目标5尺，或者在水体中向任意方向移动目标10尺。

大失败 你沿地面向任意方向移动目标10尺，或者在水体中向任意方向移动目标20尺。

Time Beacon.name: Time Beacon
Time Beacon.description: You create a beacon in time, intending to return to it if things go wrong. You can cast time beacon on only your turn. Keep careful track of everything that happens this turn after you cast time beacon. At the end of your turn, you can choose to rewind time back to just after you cast time beacon, removing all effects of your turn since then. Curses, traps, and other harmful effects that happen during your turn might prevent you from returning to the beacon if they are powerful enough. If you suffered any harmful effects during your turn after casting time beacon, to return to your beacon, time beacon attempts a counteract check against each such effect. If it fails at any of these checks, you can't return. After returning to the time beacon, the spell ends.

Time Jump.name: Time Jump
Time Jump.description:
You leap forward a few seconds in time, appearing across the battlefield in the blink of an eye. You gain 2 actions, each of which must be used to Leap, Stand, Step, or Stride. If you have an appropriate Speed, you can add @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrow}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}to this list. While you take these actions, time pauses. All other creatures are completely unaware of your actions, can't speak, and can't use any actions that would be triggered by your movement.

While you're taking these actions, you can't take any other actions, including any that would be triggered by the move actions. Once the actions are complete, time starts again, and to onlookers, you seem to have suddenly teleported across the distance you traveled. Leaping forward through time is disorienting, so if you use time jump again within 1 minute of using the spell, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 4} for 1 minute.

Time Stop.name: 时间静止 Time Stop
Time Stop.description:
你暂时停止除了自身以外的所有事物的时间，这令你能够使用数个动作，但在其他人看来似乎完全没有消耗时间。在施放时间静止后，你可以立即使用至多9个动作，它包括3组，每组3个动作。

在每组动作后，仅对你，指定你为目标或者影响你的效果，以及你在时间静止中创造的效果会经过1轮。所有其他生物和物体不会被你的攻击影响，并且你无法以任何东西影响它们，或以它们为目标。

当你完成你的动作后，其他世界的时间会再次流动。如果你创造了一个效果，其持续时间会超过时间静止的持续时间，它会立即影响其他人，但这对在你刚施放该法术时发生的效果没有作用。

Timely Tutor.name: Timely Tutor
Timely Tutor.description:
You serve as an astral connection between your eidolon or familiar and the Akashic Record-a demiplane consisting of a comprehensive psychic library-then turn to the creature for advice. If you cast this spell on your familiar, your familiar adds your spellcasting ability modifier on checks to Recall Knowledge with the Lore skill of your choice, much like it does for Acrobatics and Stealth. Your familiar must have the speech familiar ability in order to share any information it learns with you. If you cast this spell on your eidolon, it instead becomes trained in the Lore skill.

If you lose physical contact with the target, its connection to the Akashic Record is severed and timely tutor immediately ends.

Tireless Worker.name: Tireless Worker
Tireless Worker.description: You suppress your choice of one of the following conditions that's affecting the target: @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}. If you don't remove the effect that caused the condition, the condition returns after the spell's duration expires.

Tongues.name: 巧言术 Tongues
Tongues.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

Tortoise and the Hare.name: Tortoise and the Hare
Tortoise and the Hare.description:
You prove that slow and steady doesn't always win the race by turning a foe into a proverbial tortoise and yourself or an ally into a hare, siphoning some of the foe's speed and granting it to the other target. The effects depend on the foe's Fortitude save.

Critical Success The targets are unaffected.

Success The foe is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round, and the other target is unaffected.

Failure The foe is slowed 1 for 3 rounds and the other target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 round. It can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.

Critical Failure The foe is slowed 1 for 3 minutes and the other target is quickened for 1 minute. It can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.

Touch of Corruption.name: 腐化之触 Touch of Corruption
Touch of Corruption.description:
你将负能量注入目标。若目标是活物，则会造成1d6点负能量伤害（基础强韧豁免）；豁免失败时，目标的AC还会承受-2状态减值，持续1轮。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.GhNVAYtoF5hK3AlD]{法术效果：腐化之触}

若目标是自愿的不死生物，则会立即恢复6点生命值，若你就是不死目标，你还会在伤害检定上获得+2状态加值，持续1轮。

@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ekGHLJSHGgWMUwkY]{腐化之触 (治疗)}

升阶 (+1) 对活物造成的伤害量增加1d6点，或者对不死生物的恢复量增加6点。

Touch of Corruption (Healing).name: 腐化之触（治疗） Touch of Corruption (Healing)
Touch of Corruption (Healing).description:
你将负能量注入目标。若目标是活物，则会造成1d6点负能量伤害（基础强韧豁免）；豁免失败时，目标的AC还会承受-2状态减值，持续1轮。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.GhNVAYtoF5hK3AlD]{法术效果：腐化之触}

若目标是自愿的不死生物，则会立即恢复6点生命值，若你就是不死目标，你还会在伤害检定上获得+2状态加值，持续1轮。

升阶 (+1) 对活物造成的伤害量增加1d6点，或者对不死生物的恢复量增加6点。

Touch of Idiocy.name: 愚者之触 Touch of Idiocy
Touch of Idiocy.description:
你令目标精神迟钝；目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}。

大失败 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 4}。

Touch of Obedience.name: 服从之触 Touch of Obedience
Touch of Obedience.description:
你的统御之触溶解了目标的意志，令其更易被操控。目标尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} ，直到你的当前回合结束。

失败 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} ，直到你下个回合结束。

大失败 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}，持续1分钟。

Touch of Undeath.name: 亡灵之触 Touch of Undeath
Touch of Undeath.description:
你用亡灵的力量攻击目标的生命力，造成1d6负能量伤害。目标必须尝试一次强韧豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标承受一半伤害。

失败 目标承受完整伤害，并且在1轮中，治疗它的正能量效果仅治疗通常的一半。

大失败 目标承受双倍伤害，并且在1分钟中，治疗它的正能量效果仅治疗通常的一半。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d6。

Touch of the Moon.name: 月相触礼 Touch of the Moon
Touch of the Moon.description:
当你接触目标时，一个月亮的标志在其额头浮现，散发出月亮的光芒。该目标在20尺半径中产生昏暗光照（dim light）他也会根据月相获得好处，月相从新月开始，并在其每个回合结束时转换到下个月相。

  • 新月 New Moon 目标不受任何好处。
  • 上弦月 Waxing Moon 目标在攻击骰上获得+1状态加值，在伤害骰上获得+4状态加值。
  • 满月 Full Moon 目标在攻击骰、AC、和豁免骰上获得+1状态加值，在伤害骰上获得+4状态加值。
  • 下弦月 Waning Moon 目标在AC和豁免骰上获得+1状态加值。在这个月相之后，回到新月。

Transcribe Moment.name: Transcribe Moment
Transcribe Moment.description: You instantly create a small, permanent scroll that contains a magically precise written description of your current surroundings in every direction. Any creature who spends 1 minute to read the scroll-written in a language of your choice that you know-immediately sees and experiences your surroundings during the moment that you recorded (including whatever events transpired that round) exactly as you experienced it. This depiction records only what you can sense yourself. For example, if you can't see invisible creatures, the depiction doesn't reveal them even to a reader who could normally see them; a reader can't use their Perception to notice details you missed, but they can attempt a check to Recall Knowledge based on what they just experienced if they have knowledge that you lack. You can have multiple scrolls from transcribe moment in existence at the same time, up to a number equal to your Intelligence modifier. If you Cast the Spell again while already at the maximum number of scrolls, choose one of the current scrolls to lose its magic, then create the new one.

Transmute Rock And Mud.name: 石泥转化 Transmute Rock And Mud
Transmute Rock And Mud.description:
你转变大地的材质，将石头转化为淤泥，或者将淤泥转化为石头。在你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放该法术 Cast the Spell}时，选择下列两种选项之一。

•化石为泥 你将区域中非魔法，未加工，且无主的石头转变为等体积的淤泥。如果向岩石地面施放该法术，它成为困难地形；如果产生的淤泥至少有3英尺厚，这会成为艰难地形，或者生物可以尝试 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{游泳 Swim} 通过（DC10运动）。如果该淤泥深到生物无法触及底部，生物必须尝试游泳通过它。如果你对岩石房顶施放该法术，坠落的淤泥造成 [[/r {8d6}[bludgeoning]]]{8d6 钝击伤害} 基础反射豁免），然后会散开，在比原来法术区域大半径10尺的区域中造成困难地形。一但石头被转变为淤泥，该淤泥是非魔法的，直到自然状态令其干燥或者散开。

•化泥为石 区域中的淤泥变为未被加工的石头。如果淤泥被转变为石头时，生物正处于其中，它必须尝试一次豁免骰。

大成功 该生物逃出淤泥并站在石头上，不受影响。

成功 该生物在淤泥变成石头时爬出淤泥，在石头上 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

失败 该生物被部分困在淤泥中，获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} 1轮，或直到其 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escapes}，以先发生为准。

大失败 生物被完全困住。它获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}，持续1轮，或者直到其逃脱，以先发生为准。

升阶 (+2) 区域增加一个10尺立方体，至少与另一个立方体相邻。

Traveler's Transit.name: 行路无阻 Traveler's Transit
Traveler's Transit.description:
你向筋肉中注入能量，令你游泳和爬墙更为轻松。

当你施放该法术时，你获得攀爬速度或者游泳速度。该速度等于你的地面速度。

升阶 (5环级) 你可以选择获得飞行速度。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.N1EM3jRyT8PCG1Py]{法术效果：行路无阻(攀爬)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.0R42NyuEZMVALjQs]{法术效果：行路无阻(游泳)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.cTBYHfiXDOA09G4b]{法术效果：行路无阻(飞行)}

Tree Shape.name: 树化术 Tree Shape
Tree Shape.description: 你变形为一棵大型树。察觉检定不会发现你的本来形态，但是通过成功的对抗你的法术DC的自然（Nature）或者生存（Survival）检定，可以发现你看起来是个树，但对于该区域而言，崭新到奇怪的程度。在树形态中，你可以观察周围所有事物，但除了使用一个具有专注特征的单动作，来结束该法术且结束你的回合以外，你不能进行任何行动。成为树时，你的AC为20，并且只有状态加值，状态减值，环境加值，和环境减值会影响你。你投出的所有成和和大成功反射豁免均为失败。

Tree Stride.name: 融身入林 Tree Stride
Tree Stride.description:
你进入一个主干足够大，能够容纳你的活着的树中，并立即传送到5英里内，任一种类相同的，同样树干足够大的树中。当你进入前一棵树中时，你会立即了解到射程内其他足够大的同类树的大致位置，并且如果需要，可以从原来的树出来。你不能随身携带异次元空间；如果你尝试如此做，该法术失败。

升阶 (6环级) 你出来的树可以至多距离50英里。

升阶 (8环级) 你出来的树可以至多距离500英里。

升阶 (9环级) 你出来的树在同一星球上的任何位置。

Trickster's Twin.name: 诡计替身 Trickster's Twin
Trickster's Twin.description:
你几乎不会停留在一个位置。选择目标100尺内，且目标可见的一个地点。你在那里创造一个自身的幻象，该幻象只有它能看见，且会模仿你所有的动作。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标相信你在指定的位置，并且无法在你的实际位置看见你。在你进行一个在幻术的位置不合理的动作时，或者当该目标攻击，接触，搜索（Seek）或者其他和该幻象交战时，目标自动不相信该幻术。如果你对目标使用敌对动作，该法术结束。

失败 如同成功，但是在上述情况发生时，该目标必须通过一个成功的意志豁免来不相信该幻术。

大失败 如同成功，但是在上述情况发生时，该目标必须通过一个大成功的意志豁免来不相信该幻术。

Triple Time.name: 三拍子 Triple Time
Triple Time.description:
你以活跃的节奏起舞，加速你盟友的移动。你和所有区域内的盟友的所有速度获得+10尺状态加值，持续1轮。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.HtaDbgTIzdiTiKLX]{法术效果：三拍子}

True Seeing.name: 真视术 True Seeing
True Seeing.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

True Strike.name: 克敌机先 True Strike
True Strike.description: 对未来的一瞥令你下一次攻击得到确保。在你的回合结束前，你下一次尝试攻击骰时，这次攻击骰骰两次，并使用较好的结果。该攻击会忽视对攻击骰的环境减值，以及其他任何目标 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}所导致的纯骰检定。

True Target.name: 洞烛机先 True Target
True Target.description: 你深入后续数秒的可能未来，以此了解敌人可能避免伤害的各种手段，并该未来的影像投射在你的身周。指定一个生物。在洞烛机先持续时间中，每个目标对此生物进行的第一次攻击骰，攻击者骰两次并使用较好结果。该攻击者也会忽视对攻击骰的环境减值，以及其他任何指定的生物由于 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}所导致的纯骰检定。

Umbral Extraction.name: Umbral Extraction
Umbral Extraction.description:
You prepare to steal spells from your foes, ripping them from the foe's shadow to stow them in an ephemeral pocket in the Shadow Plane. You gain a temporary spell slot, which you can fill only by stealing a spell from an enemy spellcaster. During umbral extraction's duration, you can use the Steal action to attempt to take one of the foe's prepared spells or unused spontaneous spell slots instead of an item. You can also make one attempt to Steal as part of Casting umbral extraction. If you succeed at your check to Steal a spell, you deal 1d4 mental damage to the target per level of the spell stolen due to the psychological toll of the spiritual emptiness created by wrenching the spell away, and you place the stolen spell in your temporary spell slot. It gains the shadow trait if cast from this temporary slot.

Determine the stolen spell at random from the target's spells that are 1 level lower than umbral extraction, or from spells of the same level if you got a critical success. If the target has no spell slots of that level, use the highest level below that in which the target does have a spell slot. (If the target has no eligible spells, you get nothing, but you can continue to attempt to Steal spells for the remaining duration.) If the target is a prepared caster, you randomly steal one of their prepared spells. If the target is a spontaneous caster, you instead steal an unexpended spell slot of the appropriate level and determine the spell at random from all the target's known spells at that level. You can't steal a target's innate spells, focus spells, or cantrips. You know what the spell is as soon as you steal it, and your temporary spell slot becomes a spell slot of the same level as the spell you stole.

As normal, you can Steal only from a target within your reach. Once you've placed a spell in your temporary spell slot, you can't attempt to Steal more spells. If you succeed at your Thievery check, you must take the spell you stole. Even if you're a spontaneous caster, you can use the temporary spell slot only to cast the stolen spell and you can cast only the stolen spell from your temporary spell slot. When umbral extraction ends, you lose the temporary spell slot and any spell still stored in it. When you cast umbral extraction, any previous casting of umbral extraction currently affecting you ends.

Umbral Graft.name: Umbral Graft
Umbral Graft.description:
You reflect a spell into a shadowy version of itself, in the process depleting the power of the initial spell. During umbral graft's duration, you can use the Steal action to attempt to abscond with spells affecting a foe instead of stealing an item. You can also make one attempt to Steal as part of Casting umbral graft. If you succeed at your check to Steal a spell, randomly determine a spell affecting the foe that has a target entry. That spell ceases to affect the target, and you can either cause the spell to affect you or store it in your shadow. If your attempt to Steal was a critical success, you automatically steal the spell if its level is equal to or lower than umbral graft. If it was a success, you automatically steal it if its level is lower than umbral graft. If you succeeded, but the spell's level was too high to steal automatically, you must attempt a counteract check to see if you steal the spell. You know what the spell is as soon as you steal it. If you store it, you can transfer it to a willing creature as a single action that has the manipulate trait. The spell lasts for its remaining duration, to a maximum of 1 minute, and any time you keep it stored subtracts from its duration normally. The spell gains the shadow trait.

You can't steal constant innate spells that are always active on a creature, such as a choral angel's constant tongues, or innate spells that have special restrictions that remove their ability to target other creatures, such as an imp's invisibility. At the GM's discretion, you might not be able to steal innate spells with other unusual modifications to the base spell.

As normal, you can Steal only from a target within your reach. Once you've stolen a spell, you can't attempt to Steal more spells, nor can you choose not to take a spell if you succeed at your Thievery check. When you cast umbral graft, any spells you stole with a previous umbral graft end even if their duration hasn't elapsed. If you're affected by both umbral graft and umbral extraction, you make the choice whether to steal a spell slot, an active spell, or an item each time you Steal.

Unblinking Flame Revelation.name: Unblinking Flame Revelation
Unblinking Flame Revelation.description: You light your foe with revealing flame. The GM attempts a secret counteract check against each illusion affecting the creature; on a success, you suppress the illusion for the duration, rather than end the effect.

Unbreaking Wave Advance.name: Unbreaking Wave Advance
Unbreaking Wave Advance.description:
You unleash a mighty wave from your hand that buffets back your foes. Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortitude saving throw. If a creature pushed by unbreaking wave advance would be pushed into a solid barrier or another creature, it stops at that point and takes 3d6 damage.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is pushed 10 feet.

Critical Failure The creature is pushed 20 feet.

Heightened (+1) The damage for pushing a creature into a solid barrier increases by 1d6.

Uncontrollable Dance.name: 强迫起舞 Uncontrollable Dance
Uncontrollable Dance.description:
目标被笼罩一切的舞蹈渴求所压倒。在该法术持续时间中，目标 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} ，并且不能使用反应动作。在受到影响时，该生物除了跳舞并使用移动（Stride）动作来移动至多其速度一般的距离，不能使用任何具有移动特征的动作，

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 该法术的持续时间为3轮，并且目标每轮至少须花费1个动作来跳舞。

失败 该法术的持续时间为1分钟，并且目标每轮至少须花费2个动作来跳舞。

大失败 该法术的持续时间为1分钟，并且目标每轮必须花费其所有动作来跳舞。

Undeath's Blessing.name: 亡者祝福 Undeath's Blessing
Undeath's Blessing.description:
你将墓穴之触注入一个生物。在持续时间内， @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{伤害术 Harm} 将该生物视为不死生物， @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal} 将该生物视为活物。此外，伤害术（harm）在对目标的生命值恢复上获得+2状态加值。

如果目标希望避开此法术，则可尝试一次意志豁免用以减弱其效果。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 1轮内目标治疗术对目标产生一半的治疗，伤害术对目标造成一半的伤害。

失败 效果如文本所描述。

升阶 (+1) 生命值恢复上的状态加值增加2点。

Undermine Reality.name: Undermine Reality
Undermine Reality.description:
You lash a target with tendrils of shadow that steal some of its substance, making it quasi-real. As long as it is quasi-real, its Strikes deal half damage, it can't critically succeed at any skill check, and creatures attempting saving throws against its spells and effects get a result one degree of success better than they rolled. The target must attempt a Will saving throw.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is quasi-real until the end of its next turn.

Failure The target is quasi-real for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt another Will save, ending the spell on a success.

Critical Failure The target is quasi-real for an unlimited duration.

Undetectable Alignment.name: 隐匿阵营 Undetectable Alignment
Undetectable Alignment.description: 你对一个生物施加防护，隐藏其阵营。目标对于所有侦测其阵营的效果看起来均为中立。

Unexpected Transposition.name: Unexpected Transposition
Unexpected Transposition.description:
Trigger You are targeted with an enemy's Strike.

When attacked, you attempt to quickly swap your own position with that of another creature. A creature that is unwilling to swap places with you must attempt a Will save. Willing creatures automatically fail. If you successfully switch places with the target, the triggering attack is resolved against that creature as if it had been the original target of the attack. After the swap, you and the target are both temporarily immune to unexpected transposition spells for 1 minute. You automatically switch places if the target is willing. If it's unwilling, it can attempt a Will save. Neither of you teleports if the target succeeds at its save.

Unfathomable Song.name: 诡秘怪音 Unfathomable Song
Unfathomable Song.description:
飘忽的音符组成异样的乐曲，弥漫在空中，心智为之崩溃。当你施放该法术时，以及每回合第一次你维持该法术时，每个目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。一个生物每轮只需要尝试一次豁免来对抗该乐曲，并且你在维持该法术是必须保持相同的目标。

大成功 目标不受影响，在后续轮也不受影响，并暂时免疫1分钟。

成功 目标该轮不受影响，但它可以在后续轮被影响。

失败 根据下表，骰1d4。

大失败 根据下表，骰1d4+1。

结果 效果
1 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}
2 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}，持续1轮。
3 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 4}，持续1轮。
4 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}，持续1轮。
5 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned}，持续1轮并且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} 持续时间无限。

Unfetter Eidolon.name: Unfetter Eidolon
Unfetter Eidolon.description: You loosen the link between yourself and your eidolon, allowing it to travel farther from you for a short period of time. While the spell is active, your eidolon can travel an unlimited distance away from you. When the spell ends, if your eidolon is more than 100 feet away from you, it unmanifests.

Unfettered Pack.name: 无羁行军 Unfettered Pack
Unfettered Pack.description:
你令一同旅行者无需为环境阻碍所担忧。无论环境是否为魔法的，目标不会由于植物，碎石，狂风或者其他环境特性在速度上承受环境减值，并且它们会忽视这些环境特性导致的困难地形。

升阶 (9环级) 目标也会忽略来自环境特性的艰难地形。

Unfolding Wind Rush.name: Unfolding Wind Rush
Unfolding Wind Rush.description:
You travel on a rushing wind. Move two times: two Strides, two Steps, or one Stride and one Step (in either order). You can Stride or Step into the air during this movement, moving upward at a 45-degree angle at most; if you end your movement in the air, you fall after taking one action or when your turn ends, whichever comes first. A @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.it4ZsAi6XgvGcodc]{Wall of Wind} appears in all the spaces you left during this movement, lasting for 1 round.

Heightened (5th) The wall of wind lasts 3 rounds.

Unimpeded Stride.name: 无碍步伐 Unimpeded Stride
Unimpeded Stride.description: 没有任何事物能让你定于一处。你立即从所有令你 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} 的魔法效果中逃脱，除非该效果环级高于你的无碍步伐法术。然后你进行行走（Stride）。在这次移动中，你忽视困难地形，以及任何速度上的环境或者状态减值。

Unity.name: 团结 Unity
Unity.description:
触发 你以及1个或者更多射程内的盟友被一个允许豁免骰的法术或者能力作为目标。

你建立起联合防御。在对抗触发法术时，每个盟友可以使用你的豁免骰调整值，代替自身的调整值。每个盟友各自决定使用哪个调整值。

Unrelenting Observation.name: 无休监控 Unrelenting Observation
Unrelenting Observation.description:
该法术赋予完美的探知视野，令数个自愿目标可以追踪一个生物或者物体的准确移动或者位置。选择区域中的一个目标生物或者物体，作为追踪目标。它成为该法术的传感器。你选择区域中至多五个自愿生物，该生物或者物体离开其视野时，它们可以看见该生物或者物体的隐约影像。它们能完美察觉该生物或者物体，它们可以忽视其 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} 状态，但物理障碍仍然会提供掩蔽。

除了铅或者流水能阻碍影像，追踪者能够穿过一切障碍看见被追踪生物或者物体距离没有任何影响，但该生物或者物体可能会移动过于遥远，以至于小到无法察觉。追踪者无法看见目标周围的环境，但它们能看到生物所穿戴或者持握的装备，并且它们知道这个生物从身上取下物体。

如果被追踪的目标是自愿的，该持续时间为1小时。如果你尝试追踪一个非自愿生物，目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 该生物或者物体不受影响。

成功 上所述，并且持续时间为1分钟。

失败 如上所述，并且持续时间为1小时。

Unseasonable Squall.name: Unseasonable Squall
Unseasonable Squall.description:
You issue a blast of sudden wind that ripples outward from the center of the burst. The wind extinguishes small non-magical fires, disperses fog and mist, scatters objects of light Bulk or less, and pushes unsecured objects of 1 Bulk or less 5 feet away from the spell's origin point. Each Medium or smaller creature in the area when you Cast the Spell or that moves into spell's area must attempt a Fortitude saving throw.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. If the creature was Flying, it gets a critical failure instead.

Critical Failure The creature is pushed 30 feet away from the center of the burst, is knocked Prone, and takes 2d6 bludgeoning damage.

Unseen Custodians.name: 隐形仆役群 Unseen Custodians
Unseen Custodians.description:
你创建出了一个处于固定地区、且长期存在的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.xqmHD8JIjak15lRk]{隐形仆役 Unseen Servant} 法术效果，由力场组成的实体会在固定地点执行基础任务。

大成功 仪式创造了6个隐形仆役。你不需要为它们维持专注，而且它们也不是被召唤来的仆从。你能花费1个具有专注特征的动作，以此来命令1个隐形仆役执行基础工作；它会持续执行该任务直至被再次命令为止。

成功 同大成功，但仪式只创造了3个隐形仆役。

失败 仪式没能创造任何仆役。

大失败 仪式创造了6个隐形仆役，但是这些生物具有敌意且能够使用拳头进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{打击 Strikes} ，其攻击加值等同于你在主要技能检定中的技能调整值，造成1d6点力场伤害（force damage）。它们会攻击你以及你的盟友，并且尝试破坏此区域内属于你和盟友的物品。

升阶 (6环级) 若被摧毁，这些隐形仆役会在第二天清晨重组。仪式开销增加至30gp。

Unseen Servant.name: 隐形仆役 Unseen Servant
Unseen Servant.description:
你召唤一个隐形仆役（见边栏），你可以通过维持该法术的一部分来命令它。它会为你服务直到其生命值被减少到0，此时法术结束，或者直到你停止维持该法术。隐形仆役获得被召唤特征。

隐形仆役 Unseen Servant [生物] [-1] [无心智] [中型]

AC 13, 强韧 +0, 反射 +4, 意志 +0 HP 4

免疫 疾病，心灵，非魔法攻击，麻痹，毒素，精准，失去意识

抗力 所有伤害5（除了力场或者幽冥）

速度 飞行30尺

力场身躯 Force Body 隐形仆役的身躯由力场组成。它无法使用攻击动作。它能够移动，以及使用交互（Interact）动作来进行拿取物体、打开未堵上未上锁的门、拿着椅子、清洁等工作。它无法穿过固体。

Unspeakable Shadow.name: Unspeakable Shadow
Unspeakable Shadow.description:
You alter a creature's shadow, transforming it into a terrifying monster out to devour the creature. The creature must attempt a Will save. A creature that has the frightened condition from unspeakable shadow must spend at least one of its actions each turn to either attack its shadow (making a Strike ineffectually) or flee from its shadow (using one action to move away as though it had the fleeing condition).

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}. It can't reduce its frightened value below 1 for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is so afraid, it might instantly die. It must succeed at a Fortitude save or die; this saving throw has the incapacitation trait. If it succeeds at its save, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 4} and can't reduce its frightened value below 1 for 1 minute.

Untwisting Iron Buffer.name: Untwisting Iron Buffer
Untwisting Iron Buffer.description:
You send currents of protective ki to the surface of your body that protect you from harm, at least until your enemies dissipate them. You gain 15 temporary Hit Points, which last for up to 3 rounds.

Heightened (+1) The temporary Hit Points increase by 5.

Unusual Anatomy.name: 异常体态 Unusual Anatomy
Unusual Anatomy.description:
你将你的肉体和内脏转化为一种混合着闪亮皮肤、粗糙的鳞片、针一般的毛发、凸出的冲囊的奇异形态。这拥有三种效果：

  • 你获得10点精准伤害抗力，以及10点暴击额外伤害的抗力。如果抗力值大于额外伤害，则会将额外伤害降低至0，而不会降低攻击所造成的普通伤害。
  • 你获得黑暗视觉。
  • 你的皮肤上分泌出了酸液。任何使用非武装攻击或者非长触及武器命中你的生物受到2d6点酸液伤害。

升阶 (+2) T抗力增加5点，酸液伤害增加1d6点。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.LMzFBnOEPzDGzHg4]{法术效果：异常体态}

Updraft.name: Updraft
Updraft.description:
A powerful blast of wind erupts from the ground, launching the target into the air and sending it crashing back down. The collision deals 2d6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Reflex save. On a failure, the target is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Heightened (+1) Increase the damage by 2d6.

Upheaval.name: Upheaval
Upheaval.description:
The ground in the area shudders and crumbles as huge pillars of stone erupt into the air, rending the terrain around them.

The GM might add additional effects in certain areas. Cliffs might collapse, causing creatures to fall, or a river might be blocked and flood the surrounding area.

  • Stone Debris The area becomes difficult terrain.
  • Rising Pillars Pillars of smooth stone rise from your chosen number of 10-foot squares on a surface in the area, ascending up to 60 feet in height. Each pillar stops when it hits a structure or ceiling unless that structure collapses (see below). The DC to Climb or Grab an Edge on a pillar is 30. Each creature on a pillar after it rises must succeed at a Reflex saving throw or fall off the nearest edge (the creature can choose which edge, if several are equally close). A creature on a pillar that is stopped by a structure falls without attempting a save.
  • Structural Collapse Structures and ceilings might collapse. The GM rolls a flat check for each (DC 14 for a sturdy structure, DC 9 for an average structure and most natural formations, all adjusted higher or lower as the GM sees fit). In general, shoddy structures automatically collapse. A collapse deals 11d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures beneath it; each creature caught in a collapse must attempt a Reflex save to avoid it. If the creature is forced to attempt a Reflex save because it was on a rising pillar, it uses the same result.

Critical Success The creature takes half collapse damage.

Success The creature takes half the collapse damage and falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Failure The creature takes the full collapse damage and falls prone.

Critical Failure The creature takes the full collapse damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by debris until it successfully Escapes (DC equal to the spell's save DC).

Vampiric Exsanguination.name: 血族驱命 Vampiric Exsanguination
Vampiric Exsanguination.description:
你伸出手臂，抽取其他生物的血液和生命力。你对区域中的活物造成12d6负能量伤害。你获得等于一个生物从该法术受到的伤害一半的临时生命值；计算该临时生命时，使用承受最多伤害的生物。你在1分钟后失去任何剩余的临时生命值。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加2d6。

Vampiric Maiden.name: 鲜血铁棺 Vampiric Maiden
Vampiric Maiden.description:
虚幻的铁处女突然将目标困住，并吸取其生命力，以增益你的生命。这会造成 [[/r {4d4}[piercing]]]{4d4 穿刺伤害} 和 [[/r {4d4}[negative]]]{4d4 负能量伤害}，目标必须尝试一次强韧豁免。你获得等于目标承受的负能量伤害的临时HP（在计算抗力，弱点和类似效果后）。在一分钟后，你会失去剩余的临时HP。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标承受一半伤害。

失败 目标被暂时困在鲜血铁棺中。目标承受完整伤害，并且被铁处女所 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} ，持续1轮，或者直到它使用一个 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{交互 Interact} 动作来脱身，以先发生为准。

大失败 目标承受双倍伤害，并且被铁处女所禁足，持续一轮，或者直到它 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escapes}，DC是你的法术DC，以先发生为准。

升阶 (+1) 该穿刺伤害和负能量伤害各增加 [[/r 1d4]]。

Vampiric Touch.name: 吸血鬼之触 Vampiric Touch
Vampiric Touch.description:
你的接触从目标身上抽出生命之血，以强化自身。你对目标造成6d6负能量伤害。你获得等于目标承受的负能量伤害（在抗力及类似效果生效后）一半的临时生命值。你在1分钟后失去任何剩余的临时生命值。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加2d6。

Variable Gravity.name: Variable Gravity
Variable Gravity.description:
You can adjust how strongly gravity grips you, changing between low gravity, normal gravity, and high gravity with ease. Choose one type of gravity when you cast the spell. While the spell lasts, you can change the type of gravity with a single action, which has the concentrate trait. The spell doesn't alter your physical appearance, so it's impossible to what type of gravity you're subjected to by casual observation.

  • Low Gravity You can jump double the normal distance when you Long Jump or Leap, though still to a maximum of your Speed. When you High Jump, you can use the calculation for a Long Jump but don't double the distance. Rather than the normal calculation for falling damage, when you fall, you take no damage for the first 10 feet and then take bludgeoning damage equal to a quarter of the remaining distance you fell. Abilities that adjust how much falling damage you take still apply.
  • High Gravity You become encumbered. You gain a +2 status bonus to your saving throws and DCs to resist forced movement and attempts to knock you @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. You reduce the distance forced movement moves you by half or 10 feet, whichever is more. You can only jump half as high and far. Rather than the normal calculation for falling damage, you take bludgeoning damage equal to the distance you fall. Abilities that adjust how much falling damage you take still apply. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.28NvrpZmELvyrHUt]{Spell Effect: Variable Gravity (High Gravity)}

Heightened (6th) The duration increases to 1 hour

Veil.name: 隐匿之纱 Veil
Veil.description:
你将目标伪装为另一个身形相似身高相仿体重相近的生物。该伪装能够隐藏目标的身份，或者令其如同其他族裔，但这不足以令其扮作另一个特定个人。该法术不会改变声音，气味，或者仪态。你为每个目标分别选择伪装；例如，你可以令一个目标看起来是矮人，另一个看起来是精灵。施放隐匿之纱视为假扮（Impersonate）动作的设立伪装。这令目标忽视任何可能会从扮作不熟悉生物中获得的减值，并且会赋予其在避免他人看破你的伪装的欺骗（Deception）检定上+4状态加值，并且即使你未受训你也加上其等级。你可以解消任一或者所有这些伪装。

升阶 (5环级) 该法术也会伪装目标的声音和气味；并获得听觉特征。

升阶 (7环级) 该目标外观上可以是任何相同体型的生物，甚至是特定个人。你必须曾见过特定个人，才能重现其外观。该法术也会伪装目标的声音和气味；并获得听觉特征。

Veil of Confidence.name: 信心面纱 Veil of Confidence
Veil of Confidence.description: 你用信心的面纱笼罩自身。你减少自身当前的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened} 状态1，并且当你在持续时间中获得惊惧状态时，其数值减少1。如果你在对抗恐惧的豁免中大失败，信心面纱立即结束，并且你从大失败获得的惊惧状态会增加1而不是减少。

Veil of Dreams.name: 眠梦帷幕 Veil of Dreams
Veil of Dreams.description:
你给目标盖上了一层睡梦的帷幕，使对方做白日梦，注意力下降和行动迟缓。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标在察觉、攻击骰与意志豁免上承受-1罚值，抵抗睡眠效果时意志豁免的罚值会恶化到-2。

失败 同成功，且每当目标进行专注动作时，需进行DC 5的裸骰检定，失败时该动作被打断。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.hkLhZsH3T6jc9S1y]{法术效果：眠梦帷幕}

Ventriloquism.name: 腹语术 Ventriloquism
Ventriloquism.description:
当你说话，或者通过喉嗓发出其他的声音，你可以令你的声音如同从60尺内的其他位置发出，并且你可以随着你说话，自由改变该发声位置。任何听见该声音的生物可以尝试不相信的你的幻术。

升阶 (2环级) 该法术时间增加到1小时，并且你也可以改变其语调，音质等声音属性。在生物尝试不相信你的幻术前，它必须主动尝试一次察觉检定，或者使用动作与声音交互。

Verdant Sprout.name: Verdant Sprout
Verdant Sprout.description:
You imbue a single ordinary, inexpensive plant seed with primal energy and throw it onto a surface, where it gradually sprouts into a Medium plant. After 10 minutes, the plant is sturdy enough to provide standard cover, and its space is difficult terrain. The plant is laden with nutritious nuts or fruit sufficient to feed one Medium creature for a day. The plant has AC 10, Hardness 5, and 20 Hit Points.

Heightened (+1) You throw an additional seed, which grows into an additional plant within range.

Verminous Lure.name: Verminous Lure
Verminous Lure.description:
Upon casting, the target emits a musk that's captivating to certain animals. Tiny animals and animal swarms of any size within range must attempt a Will save. On a failure, non-hostile animals or animal swarms try to touch the target. If hostile, such creatures choose to attack the target instead of other foes, if able to do so without spending additional actions or exposing themselves to additional danger.

Verminous lure doesn't change animals' attitudes towards the target and is easily overridden by more direct control, such as the Command an Animal action. Animals with imprecise sense can use their scent as a precise sense against the target.

Vibrant Pattern.name: 震荡图纹 Vibrant Pattern
Vibrant Pattern.description:
你创造一个由剧烈跳动的光芒组成的图纹。在图纹中的生物 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} 。除此之外，在你施放时处于图纹中的生物，进入图纹中的生物，在图纹中结束回合的生物，或者对图纹使用搜索（Seek）或者交互（Interact）动作的生物在此时必须尝试一次意志豁免。已经被图纹所 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} 的生物无需尝试新的豁免。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 图纹令该生物目盲（blinded）。如果它离开了图纹，在它每个回合结束时，它可以尝试一次新的豁免，以从目盲（blinded）状态中回复，此处最大持续时间为1分钟。

大失败 该生物目盲（blinded），持续1分钟。

Vibrant Thorns.name: 护体棘刺 Vibrant Thorns
Vibrant Thorns.description:
你的身体涌出一层茂密的棘刺，它会伤害攻击你的人，并增强生命魔法。通过近战攻击命中你的邻接敌人，以及通过无武装攻击命中你的敌人，每次如此均承受1穿刺伤害。当你施放正能量法术时，你的棘刺造成的伤害增加到1d6，直到你的下个回合开始。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1，当你施放正能量法术后为增加1d6。

Vigilant Eye.name: 警惕之眼 Vigilant Eye
Vigilant Eye.description: 你创造出1个 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} 的眼球感受器，就如同 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zvKWclOZ7A53DObE]{鹰眼术 Clairvoyance}一般。在创造感受器时，这个眼睛必须在你的视线（line of sight）之内。当你的持续时间结束时，你能以自由动作花费1点聚能点来将持续时间延长1小时，就如同正常情况一般，它会在你下一次进行日常准备（daily preparations）时立刻结束。

Vision of Weakness.name: 识破弱点 Vision of Weakness
Vision of Weakness.description:
你集中精神观察目标生物，转瞬即逝的神力洞察看穿目标的本质。若目标拥有弱点，你获得其弱点信息，无论是否有弱点，你知晓目标调整值最低的豁免。

你同时知晓其移动方式，并在你回合结束前的下一次攻击骰（或攻击动作一部分的技能检定）中获得+2状态加值。

目标对识破弱点法术获得1天的临时免疫。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.70qdCBokXBvKIUIQ]{法术效果：识破弱点}

Visions of Danger.name: 大难临头 Visions of Danger
Visions of Danger.description:
法术区域中充满可怕生物的幻影。该生物看起来是超小型集群怪物，其外观由你指定，例如地狱苍蝇或者活化锯齿剑。在爆发区域被创造时进入区域中的，在爆发区域中结束回合的，以及在爆发区域中开始回合的每个生物受到8d8心灵伤害（基础意志豁免）。在其意志豁免骰上大成功的生物可以立即尝试不相信该幻觉。与该怪物交互（Interact），或者通过搜索（Seek）动作观察该怪物的生物可以尝试不相信该幻术。不相信该幻术的生物在之后不会再因该幻术受到伤害。

升阶 (+1) 该心灵伤害增加1d8。

Vital Beacon.name: 活力信标 Vital Beacon
Vital Beacon.description:
生命力自你放射而出，其他人能够通过祈愿而获得治疗。每轮一次，你或者一个盟友可以使用一个交互（Interact）动作，可以通过用手接触你向你祈愿，并回复生命值。每当信标治愈某人后，其强度会减弱。它对第一个生物回复4d10生命值，第二个为4d8，第三个为4d6，第四个为4d4，这之后法术结束。你同时只能有一个活力信标。

升阶 (+1) 该信标在治疗时额外回复一个骰子的生命值，使用和对应阶段的骰子相同的骰子。

Volcanic Eruption.name: 火山爆发 Volcanic Eruption
Volcanic Eruption.description:
地面裂开，滚动的熔岩喷薄而出，形成的火柱对该区域中的生物造成14d6火焰伤害。该岩浆会快速冷却，并复盖区域中的生物。被岩石复盖中的生物获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}，并且在其速度上承受-10尺状态减值。对于飞行生物，所有普通地形均为困难地形，并且这些生物会在被复盖时立即降低20尺，但它们不会因这次坠落承受伤害。被岩石复盖的生物可以尝试对抗你的法术DC以逃脱（Escape）来终止该效果。否则，该生物会一直被岩石复盖，直到承受累计50点伤害，使其从岩石中脱身。除此之外，在该区域中的，以及距离岩浆柱5尺的生物会由于剧烈的热量承受3d6火焰伤害，无论豁免结果为何。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物承受一半伤害。

失败 该生物承受完整伤害，并被岩石复盖。

大失败 该生物承受双倍伤害，并被岩石复盖。

升阶 (+1) 区域中的伤害增加2d6，剧烈热量的伤害增加1d6。

Vomit Swarm.name: 喷吐虫群 Vomit Swarm
Vomit Swarm.description:
你喷出一团魔法虫群。你通过想象来塑造这些生物，由此你能改变这些生物的外观（通常是蜈蚣、蟑螂、黄蜂和蠕虫的混合体），但这不会改变法术的效果。虫群涌过区域中的每个人，其叮咬造成 [[/r {2d8}[piercing]]]{2d8 穿刺伤害} （基础反射豁免）。在豁免骰中失败的生物也会获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。当该法术结束时，虫群也会消失。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加 [[/r {1d8}[piercing]]]{1d8 穿刺}。

Voracious Gestalt.name: Voracious Gestalt
Voracious Gestalt.description:
You create a powerful spirit entity that grows and builds strength by consuming the spirits of foes you both slay. When you Cast the Spell, the gestalt deals 14d6 negative damage to all living creatures of your choice in the area, with a basic Fortitude save. Creatures you choose that end their turns in the area take [[/r {6d6}[negative]]]{6d6 negative damage} damage, with a basic Fortitude save.

At the end of each of your turns, if you killed a living creature during that turn or if the gestalt's damage killed a creature since the end of your prior turn, you add the slain creature's soul to the gestalt. The emanation's radius increases by 20 feet and the damage dealt by the aura increases by [[/r 1d6#negative]]. (Note that this increase only happens once, even if you killed multiple living creatures that turn.) As normal for determining threat level, the GM determines if a creature is of significant enough threat to empower the gestalt; in general, a creature several levels below you rarely poses a significant threat.

Heightened (10th) The initial damage increases to 16d6 and the aura's damage starts at [[/r {6d6}[negative]]].

Wail of the Banshee.name: 女妖之嚎 Wail of the Banshee
Wail of the Banshee.description:
你的嘶嚎令敌人魂飞魄散。在区域中的每个活着的敌人承受8d10负能量伤害，并且必须尝试一次强韧豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标承受完整伤害。

失败 目标承受双倍伤害，并且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained} [[/r 1d4]]。

大失败 目标承受双倍伤害，并且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 4}。

Waking Nightmare.name: 白日噩梦 Waking Nightmare
Waking Nightmare.description:
你用该生物噩梦中最可怕的影像填满其心灵。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。如果目标在你施放该法术时 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} ，他在尝试其豁免前立即醒来，并且如果它在豁免中失败，它会在下述效果基础上额外获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing} 状态，持续1轮。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

失败 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

大失败 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}。

Wall of Fire.name: 火墙术 Wall of Fire
Wall of Fire.description:
你创造一面火焰墙壁，它会灼烧穿过它的生物。你创造至多60尺长的10尺高5尺厚的直线型火焰墙壁，或者5尺厚，10尺半径10尺高环形火焰。该墙无论哪种形态均为竖直墙；如果你想的话，墙的高度可以更小。墙一侧的任何事物对于另一侧的生物而言均为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。任何穿过该墙或者在回合开始时占据墙的区域的生物承受4d6火焰伤害。

升阶 (+1) 该火焰伤害增加1d6。

Wall of Flesh.name: 肉墙术 Wall of Flesh
Wall of Flesh.description:
你创造一面20尺高，30尺长，直线型的由活肉构成的墙壁。该墙壁有3英尺厚，每5尺长的墙具有AC10和75HP。如果你想的话，该墙壁的长度和高度可以更小。你必须将该墙放在连续的开放空间中，令其边界不会穿过任何生物或者物体，否则你会失去该法术。该墙壁无法被 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{修复 Repaired} ，但是可以通过正能量以及治疗法术和能力所治疗。当你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放该法术 Cast the Spell}时，为你的墙选择下列特性之一。

• 嘴 墙壁表面长满了布满尖牙的嘴。这些嘴会对距离墙壁5尺内结束回合的生物进行打击（Strike），对于这些打击（Strike）使用你的法术攻击骰，造成等于 [[/r 1d6]] + 你的施法属性调整值的穿刺伤害。这些嘴能够引用药水；只要墙壁还活着，它能够通过 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.2RuepCemJhrpKKao]{治疗药水 Healing Potion}回复生命值，但是他无法从任何赋予其移动能力的效果中获得好处。除此之外，GM决定什么药水能够影响该墙壁。

• 眼 墙壁上张开无数不眨的眼睛。你可以通过这些眼镜视物，在墙壁视觉线内获得视觉察觉（Perception）检定上的+2环境加值。你也可以使用这些眼镜来决定远程攻击和法术的视觉线，但你的效果线无法穿过墙壁。

• 臂 墙壁由一团相互抓握的手臂组成。任何在墙壁5尺内结束回合的生物必须尝试一次反射豁免。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 该生物被墙壁 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} ，持续1轮，或者直到对抗你的法术DC以 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escapes}，以先发生为准。

大失败 该生物被墙壁 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}，持续1轮，或者直到对抗你的法术DC以逃脱（Escape），以先发生为准。

Wall of Force.name: 力墙术 Wall of Force
Wall of Force.description:
你创造一面 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} 的由纯粹魔法力量构成的墙，它至多50尺长20尺高。该墙没有可以计量的厚度。你必须将该墙放在连续的开放空间中，令其边界不会穿过任何生物或者物体，否则你会失去该法术。该墙具有AC10，硬度30，以及60生命值，并且它免疫重击和精准伤害。物理效果无法穿透该墙壁，并且由于其由纯粹的力组成，他也会阻挡虚体（incorporeal）和灵体（ethereal）生物。传送效果和视觉效果（因为该墙是透明的）可以穿过该屏障。力墙术免疫环级比其更低的反制效果，但是该墙会由于任何环级的解离术（disintegrate）、接触到抹消权杖（rod of cancellation）或者接触到毁灭黑洞（sphere of annihilation）而被摧毁。

升阶 (+2) 该墙的生命值增加20。

Wall of Ice.name: 冰墙术 Wall of Ice
Wall of Ice.description:
你构造一面由冰组成的屏障，它能阻挡视线，并且在被破坏后也能冻结敌人。你创造至多60尺长的1尺厚10尺高冰墙（该墙壁无需是竖直的，但两边必须固定到固体表面上）或者1尺厚10尺半径的半球形。这面冰组成的墙壁是不透明的。如果你想的话，该墙壁的长度，高度，半径都可以更小。

你必须将该墙放在连续的开放空间中，令其边界不会穿过任何生物或者物体，否则你会失去该法术。每一段10尺乘10尺的墙壁具有AC10，硬度10，以及40生命值，并且它免疫重击，寒冷伤害，以及精准伤害。这样的一段墙也具有对火焰弱点15；被火焰摧毁的墙壁会融化或升华，变为水和蒸气。一段被其他方法摧毁的墙会留下一团寒冷的冰块，它是困难地形，并且会对穿过的生物造成2d6寒冷伤害。

升阶 (+2) 每一段墙的生命值增加10，并且对穿过被摧毁部分生物造成的寒冷伤害增加1d6。

Wall of Radiance.name: Wall of Radiance
Wall of Radiance.description:
You form a wall of brilliant light that obscures creatures. You create a thin wall of light in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high. You must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. The wall stands vertically. If you wish, the wall can be of a shorter length or height.

Creatures adjacent to the wall are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}. Creatures that move through the wall take 2d6 fire damage (basic Fortitude save) as the concentrated light burns them.

Heightened (4th) The bright light makes it difficult to discern creatures on the other side. Creatures are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to other creatures on the opposite side of the wall from them. The fire damage increases to [[/r 3d6[fire]]]{3d6 fire damage}.

Wall of Shadow.name: Wall of Shadow
Wall of Shadow.description:
You form a wall of pure darkness in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high. You must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. The wall stands vertically and, if you wish, can be of a shorter length or height. The wall prevents light from passing through and appears as a sheet of pure darkness to creatures observing it.
